loans.use: to buy stock of notebooks, paper, ballpoint pens and food and drinks.

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
Edna is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional stocks of vegetable, spices, meat, fish, etc for her restaurant business.

Edna has been in this business for one year. Edna earns more income from rice farming.

Edna has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of vegetable, spices, meat, fish, etc for her restaurant business

loans.name: Suny

texts.es: Suny de 21 años de edad , esta casada y tiene un hijo de 7 años con quien vive en su casa propia. Suny se dedica a la venta de combustibles al por mayor y menor. Tiene su negocio instalado en una esquina muy concurrida por vehículos de transporte pesado y vehículos menores como motos y mototaxis. Su trabajo le brinda buenos ingresos económicos y se siente muy tranquila ejerciendo esta función, el cual lo realiza con ayuda de su esposo desde hace 2 años y gracias a la buena calidad del combustible que vende y a su agradable atención ha sabido consolidar una buena clientela. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, le agrada ver que sus clientes se van muy complacidos y que los choferes transitan seguros en sus vehículos. Trabaja por las mañanas mientras que en las tardes regresa a su hogar a cumplir con las funciones de madre mientras su esposo continúa brindando el servicio en su negocio. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará combustible al por mayor para continuar vendiendo.
texts.en: Suny is 21, married, has a 7-year-old son with whom she lives in a house they own.  Suny sells fuel as wholesale and retail.  Her business is located in a busy corner with heavy load vehicles and smaller vehicles such as motorbikes and motor taxis. Her business provides good income and she feels good doing this activity, she is helped by her husband, they have done this for two years and thanks to the good quality of the fuel and the good service they provide she has been able to build a good clientele.  She really likes her work, she enjoys seeing happy customers and seeing them driving safe in their vehicles.  She works in the mornings and in the afternoons goes home to do her mother duties while her husband continues providing service at the business.  At this time, she requests 1,500 PEN and is very happy to know she will have financial support, this will give her the confidence to move forward with her business.  On the other hand, she commits once again to make the repayments punctually.  With the amount requested, she will buy fuel at wholesale to continue selling.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fuel to sell.

loans.name: Margaret Albany

texts.es:
Margaret una emprendedora que desde hace 3 años tiene su propio spa, en el cual hace masajes corporales a domicilio o en una habitación de su casa, muy conocida en su barrio por la calidad de los masajes y sobre todo la calidez humana y el compromiso con sus clientes.
Ella destinara el crédito para comprar equipos de trabajo (Madero terapia, lociones, esencias, camilla, manta térmica, etc.), que mejorara la calidad y la variedad del servicio que ella ofrece, permitiéndole aumentar el nivel de ventas.
Anhela ver su Spa crecer, fortalecerlo y diversificar su servicio, para lograr su objetivo principal que es tener su casa propia
texts.en:
Margaret is an enterprising woman. She has owned her own spa for the past 3 years, where she gives body massages as a home service or in a room in her house. She is well known in her neighborhood for the quality of her massages, but above all for her kindness and warmth and her commitment to her clients.

She intends to use the loan to purchase equipment for her work (wood therapy tools, lotions, essential oils, massage bed, thermal blanket, etc) which will improve the quality and variety of the service she offers. This will allow her to increase her sales. She yearns to see her spa grow, to strengthen it and diversify its service so that she may attain her main goal of having a house of her own.

loans.use: to purchase massage therapy equipment such as wood therapy tools, lotions, essential oils, massage bed, thermal blanket, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a sow and pig feed

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy a buffalo for her dairy and livestock business

loans.name: Margot

texts.es: Margot nació en la ciudad de Paucartambo y vive en la misma ciudad, ella tiene 42 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo, ella trabaja en una entidad del estado pero en sus horas libres se dedica atender su bar y le va muy bien, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar bebidas como cerveza y gaseosas, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Margot was born in the city of Paucartambo and still lives in that city. She is 42 years old and lives with her domestic partner with whom she has four children. She is a working mother and entrepreneur who is getting her family ahead through her work. She works for a government entity but in her free time she tends to her bar and it is going very well. She has been a member of the communal bank "Virgen del Rosario" for a number of years. 

At this time she requires a loan to purchase drinks such as beer and sodas. She appreciates and values the this loan and promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

loans.use: to purchase drinks such as beer and sodas.

loans.name: Evaristo Reinaldo

texts.es: El cliente vive en el sector de Fortín en Guayaquil.  Empezó a involucrarse en este negocio cuando tenía 15 años y su padre lo llevó a un taller para que pudiera apreciar la manera en la que se trabajaba.  Desde ahí le agradó el oficio de mecánica automotriz.  Su trabajo lo realiza solo, de lunes a sábado en el horario de 8 am a 5 pm.  Es soltero y no tiene hijos.  Desea invertir el dinero en la compra de soldadura, una mesa de trabajo y demás insumos necesarios para su taller.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in the Fortín sector of Guayaquil. He became involved in this line of work when he was 15. His father took him to an auto repair shop so that he could appreciate the way things were done. Since that time, he has enjoyed being an auto mechanic. He works alone, Monday through Saturday, from 8:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M. The borrower is single and has no children.

He wants to invest the money in the purchase of soldering equipment, a work table, and other needed supplies for his repair shop.

loans.use: to buy soldering equipment, a work table, and other needed supplies for his repair shop.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 51 years old. She supports her family with her buy and sell business. She has kept the business going for 13 years now and has gained a motorcycle that she uses for her business. Now, she is requesting a loan for motorcycle repair. She hopes that everything will go smoothly with her business so she can continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to repair her motorcycle

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 50 years old and a married woman. She works hard to support her family of seven members. She has a business selling vegetables in a market, normally making a net profit of $10.00 per day. She has many new customers who come to buy vegetables from her store. She has operated this type of business for more than three years.

She requested a USD 1,000 loan through HKL to buy more vegetables and meat to sell. This way, she can satisfy and increase the number of customers and generate a good profit in order to meet their living needs. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables and meat to sell.

loans.name: Rey

texts.en:
Rey is 33 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is married with two children.
 
Rey is engaged in a hog-fattening activity and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing piglets and sacks of feed for his hog fattening activity.  

Rey has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Rey hopes to engage in another type of business.

loans.use: To purchase piglets and pig feed

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.en:
Candelaria is 56 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with four children. 

Candelaria has a store and sells groceries and other consumable products and earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products to sell.
 
Candelaria has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional groceries and other consumable products to sell

loans.name: Jesusa

texts.en:
Jesusa is 48 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. 

Jesusa is engaged in a snack vending activity and earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used to purchase construction materials for her house repairs and renovations. 

Jesusa has been a member of PMPC for nine years. In the future, Jesusa hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase construction materials for her house repair and renovation

loans.name: Agar

texts.en:
Agar is 55 years old and lives in Dicoloc, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is single with no dependents. 

Agar has a store and sells groceries and other consumable products and earns approximately PHP 2,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products to sell.

Agar has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 63 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with five children.
 
Editha is engaged in a fish-selling business and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used to pay the processing fees for her son’s employment abroad and to purchase additional banyeras (tubs) of fish for resale. 

Editha has been a member of PMPC for seven years. In the future, Editha hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To pay processing fees for her son’s employment abroad and to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is 68 years old and lives in Tabo-o, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is widowed with two children. 

Antonieta is engaged in a fishing activity and earns approximately PHP 3,500 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing fishing tools and fishing nets for her livelihood. 

Antonieta has been a member of PMPC for eight years. In the future, Antonieta hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase fishing tools and fishing nets

loans.name: Fita

texts.en:
Fita is 36 years old and lives in San Isidro, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. 

Fita is engaged in hog raising and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase sacks of feed for her existing hog raising business.

Fita has been a member of PMPC for seven years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of feed

loans.name: Heide

texts.en:
Heide is 51 years old and married with 10 children.

Heide works hard to provide for her family. She runs a business buying and selling recycled materials in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of recycled materials.

Heide has borrowed and paid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buying and selling of recycled materials business for 15 years and earns additional income from food vending and buying and selling motorcycle parts.

Heide aspires to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of recycled materials

loans.name: Mawar Group

texts.en:
To increase the population of pigs, the Mawar group decided to have another loan from MUK. These loans are used to buy superior or local piglets, feed and also to renovate the cages.

Ni Komang used her loan to purchase superior piglets for fattening. The pigs will be kept for six months until they reach the maximum weight. Now the price for 1 kg of pig is between 15,000 IDR and 18,000 IDR depending on the quality of the meat. Ni Komang hopes in this period she will earn enough profit. This time she will save all the profit.

loans.use: To purchase superior piglets for fattening

loans.name: Gloria Maria

texts.es: Doña gloria, es una madre que se preocupa por el bienestar de sus hijos, hoy en día solamente tiene a una hija a su cargo quien va a la escuela secundaria, ya muy pronto tiene que ir ahorrando porque entrara a la universidad. recibe el apoyo de su esposo quien también a su lado trabaja arduamente como radio técnico. Gloria para mantener equilibrado sus gastos infaltables de la casa, solicita el crédito para poder invertir en el negocio con variedades de ropa, calzado, bolsos y también pollo y verduras lo cual vende para obtener ingresos por este medio, para la manutención de la familia siendo este el único medio seguro de ingresos para el hogar.
texts.en:
Doña Gloria is a mother who is concerned about the welfare of her children. Today she only has her daughter who is in high school and still under her care. Very soon her daughter will be leaving because she will be entering the university. Gloria has the support of her husband, who works hard at his job as a radio technician.

In order to keep her household expenses in check, Gloria is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her business. She will buy a variety of clothes, shoes, and purses, as well as chickens and vegetables that she can sell to generate income. This will enable her to sustain her family since the business is her only sure means of earning household income.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothes, shoes, and purses, as well as chickens and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna, de 35 años de edad, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos a quienes educa con mucho amor. Reyna se dedica a la venta de comidas típicas de la zona y asados de pollo, cerdo y pescado, para ello instala su mesa en el frontis de su casa desde donde atiende de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes. Realiza este negocio desde hace 3 años y cuenta con la ayuda de su hija mayor para la preparación de los potajes y la atención de los clientes. Le gusta su negocio ya que le permite tener un ingreso económico con el cual poder solventar los gastos de su hogar y la necesidades de sus pequeños hijos quien es la motivación para seguir progresando, por lo contrario no le gusta cuando los precios de su insumos suben reduciendo sus ganancias pero aun así logra encontrar la rentabilidad en sus ventas, tiene planes de seguir con su negocio y mantenerlo como lo ha hecho hasta ahora. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, por tanto agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para acceder al crédito que necesita para continuar con el logro de sus metas. Se compromete a ser una cliente puntual y muy responsable con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado comprará ingredientes para la preparación de sus comidas a precio por mayor para así tener mejores ganancias, tales como arroz, aceites, papas, y demás.
texts.en:
Reyna, age 35, lives in her own home with her husband and their four children who she trains with great love. She sells traditional local dishes as well as roasted chicken, pork, and fish. Reyna has a table set up in front of her house where she provides friendly and cordial service to her customers. She has been in this business for three years and has the help of her oldest daughter who prepares the stews and waits on the customers.

Reyna enjoys her business because it allows her to have income to pay for household expenses and provide for the needs of her young children. They provide her with the motivation she needs to continue making progress. On the other hand, Reyna does not like seeing the prices of her supplies go up because that means she earns less profit from her sales. Her goals are to continue her business and maintain it at the level it is operating now.

Reyna is taking this opportunity to request 1,000 PEN. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received to access the loan she needs to continue pursuing her goals. Reyna promises to be punctual and responsible with her loan payments. The amount she requested will be used to purchase ingredients in bulk for preparing her dishes such as rice, oil, potatoes, and other items.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, potatoes, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Croc Group

texts.es: Corc es un grupo solidario nuevo, conformado por 12 mujeres que luchan por el bienestar de sus familias. María Leticia es una de sus integrantes tiene 35 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 18, 11 y 10 años. Ella se dedica a la preparación y venta de repostería, inició vendiendo por medio de internet recetas de pasteles, después pensó que sería mejor venderlos preparados, con el crédito comprará moldes, una batidora e ingredientes para la preparación de los mismos. Su sueño es tener su propia pastelería, ser fuente de trabajo para otras personas y seguir aprendiendo, además quiere tener varios negocios para su familia, ya que quiere darles un buen futuro.
texts.en:
Croc is a new solidarity group formed of 12 women that strive for the welfare of their families.  María Leticia is one of the group's members.  She is 35 years old, married, and has three children: 18, 11, and 10 years old.  She makes a living preparing and selling pastries.  She began selling recipes for pastries on the Internet, then she thought it would be better to sell prepared pastries.  

With this loan she will buy molds, a mixer, and ingredients to prepare the pastries.  Her dream is to have her own pastry shop, to be a source of work for other people, and to continue learning.  In addition to that, she wants to have several businesses for her family because she wants to give them a good future.

loans.use: to purchase molds, a mixer, and ingredients for the preparation of pastries.

loans.name: Indomables Group

texts.es: Indomables llamadas así por una novela que les gusta, es un grupo unido y pagador. Eugenia es una joven de 23 años, casada y con una niña de 2 años. Se dedica a la venta de productos para el cuidado de la salud, empezó porque de dio cuenta de como esos productos cambian la vida saludablemente y con el crédito surtirá mas productos. Eugenia quiere tener su negocio grande y prospero, ya que quiere ser una distribuidora exitosa y ayudar a la gente a mejorar su salud.
texts.en:
Indomables, so called after a novel they like, is a united group who pays their debts. 

Eugenia is 23 years old, married, and has a two-year-old daughter. She sells healthcare products, which she began doing because she realized how these products change life in a healthy way. With her loan she will obtain more products. Eugenia wants her business to be large and prosperous. She wants to be a successful distributor and help people to improve their health.

loans.use: to buy more health products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install water pipes in his house.

loans.name: Sophie Lum

texts.en:
She is a widow with 5 children and they all live in a three-bedroom apartment in Bamenda, North West Region of Cameroon. She has faced same challenges in life, among which are inadequate finances to start up a business, the death of her father, and the repatriation of her son from abroad.
With this loan, she plans to invest by buying firewood and part of the loan will be invested in farming by buying yam seedlings. She will also use the rest to pay workers who will clear her farm and split her firewood. She believes the business will succeed because she has been doing it for a long time, has regular customers, and has fertile land to cultivate her yam seedlings. The community will benefit because there will be no scarcity of firewood around and the community will have enough food.

With the profit from this loan, she will cater to her family's needs, ensure her children's education, and she will build her house. She prefers GHAPE loans because of low interest rates, convenient repayment intervals, and also the members are trained on marketing and management skills before the loans are disbursed.

loans.use: to buy firewood and yam seedlings

loans.name: Maa Jogamaya Group

texts.en:
Lakshi is 31 years old. She lives with her two sons of 13 and 7 years, one daughter of 11 years and her husband in their own home at Bolangir of Odisha, India. The lady standing with the raised hand and the smiling face is Lakshi. 

Lakshi is an admirable woman; she had to educate and raise her children on her own. To do so, she has been running a business selling broiler chickens for the last seven years in her home town. She works eight hours a day and is well known by her customers, who know that she sells quality broilers. She earns a net profit of 300 INR per day. 

To increase her business, Lakshi, along with four other women members of her locality, formed a Joint Liability Group for availing a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. This is her second loan from the organization, and she wants use the loan to purchase more numbers of broilers and make a shed for safety. She hopes to develop a poultry farm in the future and give a better education to her children.

The other four members of her group are Sanjukta, Dasmati, Balmati and Subarnna, running businesses of fast food & tiffin center, tailoring center & vegetable vending, tea stall, and vegetable vending respectively.

loans.use: to purchase more broilers and make a shed.

loans.name: Señor De Los Milagros Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Srta. Fanny ella es soltera y tiene 18 años de edad; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cosméticos como perfumes, colonias, cremas entre otros, la socia vende de forma independiente a todas sus amistades, familiares entre otros, a la vez la socia es estudiante de la carrera de contabilidad en uno de los institutos de la ciudad, siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes para damas para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican a la venta de ropa, restaurante, reciclador, venta de comida, venta de carne y pejerrey.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These partners are members of the community bank "Señor de Los Milagros" ["God of Miracles"]. This communal bank is located in the Cusco district  in the Cusco province of the department of Cusco.

One partner is Fanny who is single and 18 years old. She alternates her daily activities between her business, where she independently sells cosmetics such as perfumes, colognes and creams, among other things, to all her family and friends; and simultaneously she is studying the field of accounting at one of the schools in the city, which will be her form of getting ahead.

Fanny requests a loan to purchase women's perfumes for her business. Fanny thanks those who support this dream through this loan and promises to make her repayments on time.

The other partners make their living through clothing sales, restaurants, recycling, selling food, and selling meat and "pejerrey" [a type of fish].

loans.use: to purchase women's perfume for her business.

loans.name: Dario

texts.es: El Sr Dario es originario de la cd. de Piedras Negras, es casado padre de tres hijos, los cuáles ya tienen sus propias familias, la única persona que vive con él es su esposa, él es una persona al cual le gustan mucho las ventas y disfruta el vender ropa usada al momento de que llegan sus clientes y se van bien satisfechos con el precio y la calidad de mercancía, esto lo hace los fines de semana y cuando están las ventas bajas, llevan mercancía para la cd. de Torreón y allá la venden, él junto a su esposa son personas muy emprendedoras y el día de hoy piden apoyo através de KIVA para poder surtir su negocio y ofrecer más variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Dario is from the city of Piedras Negras.  He is married and has three children who all have their own families, so the only person living with him is his wife.  Dario likes the sales business and enjoys selling used clothing to his customers and seeing them satisfied with the price and quality of the merchandise.  He works on weekends and when the sales volume is low he takes his merchandise to the city of Torreón to sell.

He and his wife are very enterprising and are now requesting support from KIVA to stock their business and offer more variety to their customers.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for his used clothing business.

loans.name: Noy

texts.en:
Noy is 64 years old. She is widowed and resides with her four children in the Kampong Speu province of Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening up animals for more than 10 years, earning approximately $1 daily. Three of her children are employed and earn an income of $7 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Noy is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike to run a taxi service. This purchase will help generate more income for the family. 

In the future, Noy would like to fix her house to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to run a taxi service.

loans.name: Javier Michel

texts.es: El Sr. Michel es originario de la cd. de Mérida desde muy pequeño llego junto a sus papás a la cd. de Piedras Negras desde hace 30 años con esperanzas de encontrar mejor fuente de empleo, así Michel ha vivido más tiempo en Piedras Negras que en su natal Mérida, es un hombre casado, padre de dos hijas pequeñas trabaja en el área de almacen de una empresa internacional donde fabrican fusibles. Las personas que trabajan con él mencionan que es una persona muy responsable y siempre ayuda a los demás, el próposito de Michel en estos momentos es pedir apoyo através de KIVA para construir una barda para dar seguridad a su familia y en un futuro construir un cuarto.
texts.en:
Michel is from the city of Mérida but moved when he was very young with his parents to the city of Pedras Negras where he has lived for 30 years.  With the hope of finding a better source of income, Michel has lived longer in Pedras Negras than in his natal city of Mérida.  He is married and the father of two small daughters.  He works for an international fuse manufacturer in the warehouse department.  People that work with him say he is very responsible and always helping others.

At this time Michel has decided to request support through KIVA to build an enclosing wall for the family's safety and in the future to build a room.

loans.use: To build an enclosing wall in front of his house.

loans.name: Phea

texts.en:
Phea is 36 years old. She is married and resides with three children in the Takeo province of Cambodia. She has been selling fruits for more than five years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband helps her run the business. One of her children is a driver who earns an income of $4 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in transporting her fruits, Phea is requesting a loan of $800 to purchase a motorbike to use in her fruit-selling business. This purchase will help her to transport her fruits faster. 

In the future, Phea would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to use for her fruit-selling business.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: La Sra. Virginia  es una mujer  muy  emprendedora y trabajadora.   tiene un  Club de Nutrición  tiene a la venta  Malteadas, Té y Licuados,   ella tiene el sueño de ver  crecer su Club  y tener mas variedad e productos nuevos y asi poder dar el mejor servicio a sus clientes  pero para que esto suceda ella tiene que ofrecer    el  mejor producto y mas variedad de sabores l es por eso que quiere el crédito para poder  comprar más productos  que le hace falta   como   diferentes   Sabores, Concentrados, Vitaminas y más  complementos  ella  agradecerá el  apoyo brindado , tiene planeado pagar el crédito con las  ganancias de su negocio.
texts.en:
Virginia is a very hard-working entrepreneur who runs a health club and sells malts, teas and juices.  Her dream is to expand her club and offer a wider variety of new products so she can give her customers better service.  But in order for this to happen she has to offer a better product and more flavors.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy what she needs such as flavor extracts, concentrates, vitamins and other complements.

She is grateful for the support and plans to pay back the loan with the profits from her business.

loans.use: To buy new products (flavor extracts, concentrate and vitamins).

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr: Kayi est une femme de 36 ans. Elle est mariée à un transporteur et est mère de famille. Kayi est revendeuse depuis 2002. Elle propose à ses clients des tissus et des pagnes. Elle manque d’argent ce qui l’empêche d’avoir un stock consistant. De fait, Kayi sollicite un troisième prêt chez WAGES. Elle utilisera son crédit afin de s’approvisionner en marchandises. A terme, elle voudrait ouvrir une boutique de vente de pagnes et de tissus. Elle espère aussi pouvoir acheter un terrain et contribuer au besoin du ménage.
texts.en: Kayi is a 36-year-old woman. She is married to a transportation worker and is a mother. She has been a reseller since 2002. She offers her customers fabrics and pagnes (highly colourful and decorative West African cloth). She does not have enough money which prevents her from having a consistent inventory. This is why she is requesting her 3rd loan from WAGES. She will use her loan to get more merchandise. In the long run, she would like to open a shop selling pagnes and fabrics. She also hopes to be able to buy some land and contribute to the household needs.

loans.use: to buy fabric and pagnes (traditional cloth).

loans.name: Wend Ya Ye Group

texts.fr:
Mme VERONIQUE représente le groupe WEND YA YE. Elle se porte bien. Mariée, elle est mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 11ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. 01 va à l’école.
Mme vend des habits  depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 10. Ses clients sont les habitants de son secteur (hommes, femmes et enfants).
Elle veut s’acheter 03douzaines d’habits pour enfants, 02douzaines  de foulards.
Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut réinvestir dans son activité. Mme ambitionne  agrandir son activité et mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Veronique is the Wend Ya Ye group representative. She is doing well. She is married and the mother of 2 children. The eldest child is 11 years old and the youngest, 2. One of her children goes to school.

Veronique has been selling clothing for 10 years. She gets her supplies at the Sector 10 market. Her customers are men, women and children who live in the same sector as she does. She would like to buy 3 dozen pieces of children's clothing and 2 dozen scarves. She wants to reinvest her profits in her business. Her aim is to expand her business and to take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 dozen pieces of children's clothing and 2 dozen scarves.

loans.name: Sary

texts.en:
Sary is 30 years old. She is married and resides with her two children in the Takeo province of Cambodia. She has been running a grocery store for more than two years, earning approximately $7 daily. Her husband is an arc welder who earns an income of $10 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sary is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase more groceries to sell. This money will help her add more stock to her store and generate more income for the family. 

In the future, Sary would like to expand her store and send her children to a good school. Moreover, she wants to rebuild her house to make it much stronger and provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy goods for his grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To put down a cement floor.

loans.name: Kokouvi

texts.fr: Mr Kokouvi est marié à une coiffeuse. Il a 46ans et a 04 enfants. Ils sont tous sur les bancs de l’école. Il a pour profession infirmier. C’est depuis 1999, qu’il exerce ce métier. Il a été engagé dans une école pour soigner les élèves en cas de besoin mais la possibilité aussi lui a été donnée de prendre soin des patients de l’extérieur. Des employés l’aident et il sollicite de WAGES un troisième  crédit pour s’acheter des produits pharmaceutiques. Il veut épargner pour ouvrir un cabinet médical  et permettre à ses enfants de mieux se scolariser.
texts.en: Kokouvi is married to a hairdresser. He is 46 years old and has 4 children who are all going to school. He has been working as a nurse since 1999. He was hired by a school to take care of the students when necessary, and he has also been given the possibility to care for patients outside of school. He is helped by some employees and is requesting a 3rd loan from WAGES in order to buy pharmaceutical products. He wants to save up so that he can open a clinic and make sure that his children get a better education.

loans.use: to buy pharmaceutical products.

loans.name: Yoeum

texts.en:
Yoeum is 48 years old. She is married and resides with one chid in the Siem Reap province of Cambodia. She has been employed as a farm worker who earns an income of $3 daily. Her husband (who joins her in the picture) is a Khmer traditional musician. He earns about $7 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Yoeum is requesting a loan of $400 to purchase traditional music instruments for her husband to play. In the future, she would like to rebuild her house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase traditional music instruments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install flooring and interior fittings.

loans.name: Akua

texts.fr: Revendeuse de charbons de bois à domicile, madame Akua est mariée à un professeur d’école Âgée de 46ans, elle est mère de 03 enfants tous à l’école. L’ainé est âgé de 14ans et le dernier 07ans. Afin d’acheter des charbons de bois, elle fait un second crédit à WAGES. Les profits tirés de cette vente l’aidera à acheter en quantité considérable les charbons de bois et satisfaire les besoins de la famille.
texts.en: A reseller of charcoal from her home, Akua is married to a school teacher. She is 46 years old and the mother of 3 children who all attend school. The eldest child is 14 years old and the youngest, 7. She is requesting her second loan from WAGES in order to buy charcoal. The profits she makes thanks to these sales will enable her to buy a considerable quantity of charcoal and to provide for her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy charcoal.

loans.name: Meas

texts.en:
Meas is 28 years old. He is married and resides with three children in the Siem Reap province of Cambodia. He is an automobile mechanic. He makes an income of $20 daily. His wife is a housekeeper, who looks after her children at home. 

In order to improve his family’s finances, Meas is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase cassava seeds to cultivate. This money will help him acquire the ability to run a new business and generate more income for the family. 

In the future, Meas would like to build a new house and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase cassava seeds to cultivate.

loans.name: Ramatou

texts.fr: Née en 1967, mariée à un tailleur, madame Ramatou pour contribuer aux besoins de la famille revend depuis 1999 des chaussures et trousseau bébé au marché. Son souhait est d’agrandir son activité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille avec le profit tiré de son premier crédit.
texts.en: Born in 1967 and married to a tailor, Ramatou has been selling shoes and baby outfits at the market since 1999 so that she is able to contribute to her family's needs. Her wish is to increase her business and to use the profit she makes thanks to this loan to ensure that her family blossoms.

loans.use: to buy shoes and baby outfits.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La Sra. Ana María de 41 años de edad está casada  con  el Sr. Javier de 44 años,ella  es empleada de un negocio de Gorditas Caseras  ella tiene  10 años en su empleo, ella siempre ha ayudado a su esposo con la manutención de la casa y para los estudios de sus 2 hijas   que actualmente  están en la Preparatoria ella siempre a querido  dar lo mejor a su familia es por eso que el día de hoy está solicitando un préstamo para  pintar su casa de exterior y pintar el barandal de su domicilio ya que con el tiempo se ha estado despintando y se esta oxidando es por eso que ella  usará  el préstamo  para  comprar pintura, ella agradecerá el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Ana María is 41 years old and is married to Javier who is 44. She is an employee of a Gorditas Caseras business. She has had her job for ten years. She has always helped her husband with maintaining the house and with the education of her two daughters' who are currently in preparatory school. She has always wanted to give the best to her family. It is for this that today she is requesting a loan to paint the exterior of her house and to paint the railing of her house since, with time, it has discolored and has oxidized. She will use the loan to buy paint. She will be thankful for the support provided.

loans.use: to buy paint.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock tennis shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install a gate in front of her house.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es: El joven Abraham es originario de la cd. de Torreón Coah, vive en la cd. de Piedras Negras desde hace 7 años, desde muy chico aprendió a coser ropa gracias a su mamá que le enseño el oficio, primero trabajo para una sastrería donde se dedican a la venta de vestidos para todo tipo de eventos, con lo que ganaba ahorro y compro una maquina de coser industrial, con mucho esfuerzo siguio comprando más máquinas y en la actualidad cuenta con 5 máquinas de coser, pues logro tener su propio negocio de sastería el cual es negocio familiar, donde trabaja junto su mamá, además trabaja en una pesacadería en el puesto de  cocinero para poder un día comprar una casa e instalar formalmente su negocio de costura, pues por el momento lo tiene ubicado en un cuarto de su casa de renta, pide apoyo através de KIVA para comprar materia prima y así fabricar los uniformes escolares, de los cuales ya tiene muchos pedidos y tendran mucho trabajo ya que es temporada de fabricarlos.
texts.en: Abraham is from the city of Torreón Coah. He has lived in the city of Piedras Negras for 7 years. When he was very young he learned to sew clothes thanks to his mother who taught him the trade. First he worked for a tailor's shop making dresses for all types of events. With that he earned some savings and bought an industrial sewing machine. With a lot of effort he kept buying more machines and now has 5 sewing machines. He was able to have his own tailoring business which is a family business. He works with his mother. He also works at a seafood restaurant as a cook in order to one day buy a house and formally set up his sewing business. Right now it is located in a room of the house he rents. He is asking for help through Kiva in order to buy raw materials and make school uniforms. He already has a lot of orders for them and they will have a lot of work, since it is the season for making them.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
El Sr. Vicente tiene viviendo en la cd. de Piedras Negras desde hace 45 años, es un hombre casado, muy responsable en cuanto a  darle todo lo mejor a su familia y no les haga falta nada, es padre de 3 hijos, de los cuales  un hijo estudia fuera de la cd. el cual ya pronto se recibe, lo apoya su esposa economicamente, pues ella labora en una editorial muy reconocida de esta cd. con el puesto de gerente de recursos humanos, lugar donde tiene una antigüedad aproximada a 5 años.
El Sr. Vicente cuenta con un negocio de venta de muebles de madera y objetos para el hogar como estufas, salas, lavadoras, nuevos y usados, negocio con el que cuenta desde hace aproximadamente 5 años.
Pide apoyo através de KIVA para poder aperturar otro negocio en una avenida muy transitada, lugar en el que le ayudará un hermano hacerse cargo de él, pero el dueño será él mismo de los dos lugares, solo que en el negocio actual será el Sr. Vicente quien siga atendiendolo, quisiera tambien en un futuro poder tener su propia mueblería de puros artículos nuevos y seguir ofreciendo calidad a sus clientes distinguidos.
texts.en:
Mr. Vicente has been living in the city of Piedras Negras for 45 years. He is a married man and very responsible with everything he lives his family so that they lack for nothing. He is the father of 3 children. One son goes to school out of town and will graduate soon. He wife helps him financially, because she works at a very well known publishing house in this city as a human resources manager, a place she has worked at for 5 years. 

Vicente has a business selling wooden furniture and household items such as stoves, living room sets, and washers, both used and new. He has had this business for approximately 5 years. 

He is asking for help through Kiva in order to open another business on a very busy street. His brother will help him run it, but he will be the owner of both places. Vicente will be the one running the present business. In the future, he would also like to have his own furniture store selling all new items and keep offering quality to his distinguished customers.

loans.use: to open another business.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es:
La Sra. Fabiola es originaria de la cd. de Piedras Negras, trabaja en una maquiladora muy reconocida desde hace 1 año, tiene horario de 3 de la tarde a las 11 de la noche, además por las mañanas trabaja como empleada domestica en una casa particular, es madre soltera de dos niños, de los cuales menciona son su inspiración en todo lo que hace, si trabaja mucho es para darle todo lo mejor y en ningun momento le haga falta nada.
Pide apoyo através de KIVA para constuir una barda ya que su hijo el más pequeño es muy inquieto y quiere prevenir accidentes, tambien cuando se vaya a trabajar se quede más tranquila al saber que sus hijos están seguros.
texts.en:
Fabiola is from the city of  Piedras Negras. She has worked in a well known factory in her town for 1 year. Her schedule is from 3 in the afternoon to 11 at night. In the morning she also works as a domestic employee in a private home. She is a single mother of two children, who she says are her inspiration for everything she does. If she works a lot, it is to give them everything they need so they lack for nothing. 

She is asking for help through Kiva to build a wall because her younger son is very active and she wants to avoid accidents. Also, when she goes to work, she is calmer knowing that her children are safe.

loans.use: to build a wall for her house.

loans.name: Veronica Gabriela

texts.es:
La Sra. Gabriela es originaria de la cd. de Piedras Negras, lugar donde tiene viviendo desde hace 38 años, es una persona muy amable y agradable, desde que se caso con su esposo a los dos les intereso mucho el negocio de venta de pantalones, pues les pareció interesante el negocio, primero empezaron a trabajar para otra persona y en la actualidad tienen su propio negocio de venta de pantalones los cuales se los dejan a los clientes en abonos semanales y andan por las calles vendiendolos, a esto se dedican desde hace 16 años, con mucho esfuerzo y con el ingreso que generan en este negocio les brindan todo lo que han podido a sus tres hijos quienes son su mayor felicidad.
La Sra. Gabriela pide apoyo através de KIVA para comprar más mercancía y seguir ofreciendoles a sus clientes distinguidos más variedad en cuanto a los pantalones, efectivamente comentan persona que la conocen que es una mujer muy comprometida con su familia y trabajo, al momento de invertir en su negocio sus ventas creceran y así tendrán más ingreso.
texts.en:
Ms. Gabriela is originally from the city of Piedras Negras, where she has been living for the past 38 years. She is a very friendly and cheerful person. When she got married, she and her husband both became very interested in selling pants, as it seemed like an interesting business. They first began working for another person, but today they have their own pants sales business in which they allow their customers to make weekly payments and they walk through the streets selling them. They have been involved in this business for the past 16 years, and with a lot of effort and the income that this business generates for them, they have been able to give everything they can to their three children, who are their pride and joy. 

Ms. Gabriela is asking for support through KIVA in order to buy more merchandise in order to be able to offer more pants variety to her distinguished clients. Those who know her say that she is a woman who is very dedicated to her family and her work. When she is able to invest more in her business, sales will increase and she will therefore have more income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
Eulogia es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante, ella tiene 54 años edad y tiene un hijo, ella tiene un pequeño restaurante donde prepara ricos plato de comida y le va muy bien entonces en esta oportunidad ella requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo pollos, carne, papas, verduras y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario”, agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.  

Eulogia nació y vive en la ciudad de Paucartambo donde no hay industrias, empresas, bancos pero sus vecinos se las ingenian para hacer un tipo de negocio.
texts.en:
Eulogia is a hard-working and entrepreneurial mother. She is 54 years old and has one child. She has a small restaurant where she prepares delicious food and it's going very well for her. She is requesting a loan in order to buy more supplies such as chicken, meat, potatoes, vegetables, and other things. She is a member of the communal bank "Virgen del Rosario", and is grateful for and values the loan and is committed to the responsibility of making her monthly payments on time.

Eulogia was born and lives in the city of Paucartambo where there are no industries, businesses, or banks, but her neighbors encouraged her to create a business.

loans.use: to buy more supplies such as chicken, meat, potatoes and vegetables.

loans.name: Luisa Gualupe

texts.es: Luisa es trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia, ella tiene 54 años edad y tiene siete hijos, ella tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de mates y jugos de forma ambulatoria desde las 4:30 am hasta 10 a.m. de lunes a viernes y le va muy bien entonces en esta oportunidad ella requiere el préstamo para comprar más insumos como por ejemplo azúcar, harina y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario”, agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Luisa is a hardworking and enterprising woman that is getting ahead with her family. She is 54 years old and has seven children. She has a small business; she sells infusions and juices as a street vendor, from 04:30 am until 10:00 am, from Monday to Friday. She does well, so this time she is requesting a loan to buy supplies, such as sugar and flour.

Luisa is a member of the communal bank “Virgen del Rosario”. She appreciates the loan and promises to pay the installments responsibly.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as sugar and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Luisa es trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia, ella tiene 52 años edad y tiene tres hijos, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio donde vende diferentes productos como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos, detergentes, y otras cosas más, ella en esta oportunidad ella requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercaderia como por ejemplo sacos de  azúcar, sacos de harina, sacos de arroz y otras cosas más, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario”, agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Luisa is hard working and an enterprising individual who strives to see her family be successful. She is 52 years old, has three children and she has a small store where she sells groceries that she runs out of her home, where she sells different products like rice, sugar, beans, detergent and other items. She wants to take advantage of this opportunity to ask for a loan so she can purchase more merchandise like sugar, flour, rice and more. She belongs to a communal bank called "Virgen del Rosario," and she is grateful for the loan and she promises to pay back her loan on time.

loans.use: purchase more stock like sugar, flour, rice and more.

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en: Sokhom is 53 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been selling meatballs for more than ten years, earning approximately $10 daily. Her husband is a musician who makes an income of $12 each day. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $4 per day. Due to lack of funds, Sokhom is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase timber and zinc to fix her house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase timber and zinc to fix her house.

loans.name: Mex

texts.en:
Mex is 59 years old. She is widowed and resides with three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating cassava for more than ten years, earning approximately $15 daily. In addition, she is a tailor. Her children are employed. They earn about $28 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Mex is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase cloth to make more clothes to sell. Additionally, a part of this money will be used to buy pesticide to use in her cassava cultivation. This money will help her expand her shop and earn more income for the family. In the future, Mex would like to expand her farming business to generate more income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase cloth to make more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Phorlly

texts.en:
Phorlly is 45 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been employed as a security guard in a private company for more than two years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a construction worker. In addition, he runs a motor taxi service when he is free from his work. He makes an income of about $5 per day. Two of her children are employed. They earn about $8 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Phorlly is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase a Tuk Tuk (three-wheeled auto rickshaw) for her son to run public transportation. This purchase will help him generate additional income to financially support the family. In the future, she would like to take another loan from KREDIT to restart her previous business of selling vegetables, and also to build a new house if possible.

loans.use: to purchase a Tuk-Tuk for her son to run public transportation.

loans.name: Sina

texts.en:
Sina is 47 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than a year, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a traditional musician who makes an income of $3 per day. In addition, they are rice farmers. One of her children is also employed in the factory and earns about $4 each day. 

In order to improve her farming process, Sina is requesting a loan of $1,100 to purchase cattle to use for plowing her farmland. This money will help her grow rice faster. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her youngest child earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to use for plowing her farmland.

loans.name: Rithy

texts.en: Rithy is 31 years old. He is a widower, blessed with two children, and living in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. He has been involved in making metal doors and windows for more than ten years, earning approximately $5 daily. In order to improve his business, Rithy is requesting a loan of $600 to purchase metal to use in his business. This money will help him expand his business and earn more income to support the family. In the future, he would like to rebuild his house and send his children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase metal to use in his business.

loans.name: Lay

texts.en:
Lay is 31 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been making trunks (made of palm leaf midribs) to sell for more than two years, earning approximately $3 daily. Her husband is a construction foreman who makes an income of $8 per day. 

Due to a lack of funds, Lay is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase construction materials to build a new house. This money will help her provide better living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business of raising pigs and also to send her children to a good school

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a new house.

loans.name: Samnang

texts.en:
Samnang is 38 years old. She is married and resides with two children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in raising pigs for more than two years, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband runs a business of buying and selling motorbikes. In addition, he runs a rice-grinding service. He makes an income of $6 per day. 

Due to difficulty in her family’s transportation, Samnang is requesting a loan of $400 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase will help her reduce her transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute.

loans.name: Sangvath

texts.en:
Sangvath is 23 years old. She is married and resides with one child in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than a year, earning approximately $4 daily. Her husband is a police officer. He makes an income of $4 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Sangvath is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase farmland to use for farming. This purchase will help her generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and send her child to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase farmland.

loans.name: Thon

texts.en:
Thon is 38 years old. She is married and resides with six children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than five years, earning approximately $4 daily. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $8 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Thon is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will help her save some money on her transportation to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en:
Yen is 55 years old. She is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. She has been selling Khmer noodle for more than ten years, earning approximately $5 daily. Two of her children are employed in a garment factory. They make an income of $8 each day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Yen is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a cow to breed and produce a calf to sell. By doing so, she would be able to make more income for the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get a higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to breed and produce a calf to sell.

loans.name: Henry Jair

texts.es:
Henry es un joven de 24 años de edad, esta soltero. Aprendio el oficio de pescar desde que era un niño, ya que nació a las orillas de la zona costera de El Salvador, fue con su papa que aprendió; ya que ellos siempre se han mantenido de esta actividad, debido a que en El salvador las oportunidades de empleo son muy mínimas.

Henry hace dos jornadas de pesca en la semana, cada jornada dura un día y una noche adentro del mar, colocando trasmayos y recogiendo los pescados atrapados, durante la noche duermen sentados en la lancha y haciendo turnos con otro compañero, todo  el producto que consiguen lo venden en su misma comunidad,  en los días que no pescan hace viajes con su pick up a personas que necesitan ir a la ciudad a realizar algunas compras. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar repuestos para su vehículo, también para hacerle un encajuelado al chasis debido a que se le esta deteriorando, comprara un escape nuevo y otras reparaciones.  De esta manera,  reparara bien su vehículo y estará siempre listo para cuando sus vecinos necesiten de sus servicios y no perderá de ganarse algún dinero para su familia.

Planea ahorrar y comprarse un buen carro de un modelo reciente y comprar una lancha.
texts.en:
Henry is 24 years old and is single. He learned to fish when he was a child as he was born in a coastal zone in El Salvador. He learned from his father. They have always worked in this activity since employment opportunities in El Salvador are very minimal.

Henry fishes twice a week. Each day lasts a day and one night on the sea, setting nets and capturing the fish. During the night, they sleep seated in the boat and he takes turns with other coworkers. All the products that they get they sell in their own community. On days that he doesn't fish, he uses his pick-up truck to transport people who need to go to the city to do some shopping. 

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy spare parts for his vehicle as well as do frame repair work on the chassis as it is deteriorating, to buy a new exhaust and to do other repairs. This way he will repair his vehicle so that it will always be ready when his neighbours need his services and he will not miss out on the opportunity to make some money for his family.

He plans to save and to buy a good, recent model car and a boat.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his vehicle as well as do frame repair work on the chassis as it is deteriorating, to buy a new exhaust and to do other repairs.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma, se le presenta la necesidad de más capital de trabajo, ya que iniciara el cultivo de maíz, es por ello que solicita un nuevo préstamo, el cual le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios,  tales como: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, insecticidas, plaguicidas y pago de mano de obra.
El efecto del préstamo anterior fue favorable, ya que logro aumentar la productividad y los ingresos, estos los invierte en los gastos básicos del hogar. El cliente ha mejorado sus condiciones económicas, gracias a la inversión que realizo con el crédito que Kiva le otorgo, el grupo familiar se mantiene.
texts.en:
Irma needs more working capital because she's going to start her corn crop.  This is why she's requesting a loan, which will allow her to buy the necessary agricultural inputs such as soil amendments, herbicide, pesticide, and insecticide, and to pay for labor.

The effect of the previous loan was favorable because she managed to increase productivity and her income, which she invests in her basic household expenses.  She has improved her economic conditions.  Thanks to the investment she made with the Kiva loan, she feeds her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to pay for labor

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is married and has 8 children. They all live in a seven-bedroom apartment in Bamenda, in the North West Region of Cameroon. He has faced some challenges in his life, among which are inadequate finances to start up a business, caring for his family's needs and dealing with the death of loved ones.  

With this loan he plans to buy a new motorcycle and pay for its required documents. He believes the business will succeed because he has been doing it for a long time. He has a good rider, the business is very profitable, and the business is very easy to manage. With this business activity, the community will benefit because it will ease their movement from one place to another.

With the profit from this loan, John will cater to his family's needs, ensure his children's education, and he will renovate his house. He prefers GHAPE loans because of their low interest rates and convenient repayment intervals. Also, the members are trained in marketing and management skills before the loans are disbursed.

loans.use: to purchase a new bike and pay for its required documents.

loans.name: Tuyet

texts.en:
Tuyet is requesting a new loan to buy cellphones and household products such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy cellphones and household products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Kieu

texts.en:
Kieu is 53 years old and is married with two children. Her husband is a driver for hire. She has been running a general store in front of her house for 10 years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to raise her children. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Kieu is requesting a loan to expand her business by offering more food and many kinds of soft drinks so that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy food and soft drinks to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Ana Delmy

texts.es:
Ana tiene 50 años de edad. Se dedica al comercio de venta de ropa y enchapes,desde hace unos 7 años,  antes solo era una ama de casa. Ella comenta que la necesidad la llevo a pensar que hacer, para sacar a delante a sus hijos. Dice que un día que venia del hospital, con su hijo menor que hoy tiene trece años,desesperada pues viajaba hasta la capital del país y se le hacia difícil, para el pasaje caminando con su hijo de la mano, vio unas blusas y le gustaron y las compro y las llevo a vender a su cantón, y las vendió rápido, luego compro otras, y así inicio, el negocio de ropa. Después, comenzó a vender enchapes, eso le ha servido mucho, porque cuando la abandono su compañero de vida,ella sola ha podido sacar a delante a su familia.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 2 docena de blusas, 3 docenas blumeres, 3 docenas de tangas,3 docenas calcetines,2 docenas de faldas, 1 docena de brasieres,1 docena de delantares. Con la inversión , comprar más cantidad de mercadería y con más variedad para satisfacer a sus clientes, lo que evitara viajar tan seguido hasta la capital, debido a que el viaje dura unas dos horas de ida y otras dos de regreso a casa.

su sueño es tener su negocio mas fuerte, y  un puesto en el mercado. a demás sueña con que su hijo se prepare, y que se gradué en la universidad.
texts.en:
Ana is 50 years old. She has been dedicated to selling clothes and tiles for seven years. Before she was just a housewife. She comments that necessity make her think about what to do to get her children ahead. She says that one day, she came from the hospital with her youngest son, who today is 13 years old, desperate because she traveled to the capital of the country and found it difficult. On the passage where she was walking holding her son's hand, she saw some blouses and she liked them and she bought them and took them to her region to sell. She sold them quickly and then bought others and thus started her clothing business. After, she began to sell tiles. This has served her well because when her husband left her, she alone was able to get her family ahead.

The loan that she is requesting from  Fundación Campo is to buy to buy 2 dozen blouses, 3 dozen pairs of underwear, 3 dozen thongs, 3 dozen socks, 2 dozen skirts,  a dozen bras, a dozen aprons. With the investment,she will buy a greater quantity of merchandise and greater variety to satisfy her customers. She avoids traveling to the capital because the trip takes 2 hours there and two hours to return home. 

Her dream is to have a stronger business and a stall in the market. She also dreams that her son studies and graduates from university.

loans.use: to buy 2 dozen blouses, 3 dozen pairs of underwear, 3 dozen thongs, 3 dozen socks, 2 dozen skirts,  a dozen bras, a dozen aprons.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
María tiene 28 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos. Se dedica al comercio desde hace unos 7 años. Antes se dedicaba a los oficios domésticos,pero cuando se acompaño, ella quizo ayudar a su  compañero,y primero se inicio haciendo pupusas con su suegra,luego aprendió también hacer hamburguesas, tortas mexicana. Después,  con su compañero instalaron una pequeña tienda que la iniciaron con cincuenta  dolares, y cada día ha ido creciendo, a demás instalaron un molino,para buscar siempre traer los alimentos para su familia.

Ella comenta que su vida es un poco agitada, se levanta a las 5: 00a.m. para atender los clientes,que llegan a comprar pan para el desayuno,por la tarde se desplaza a unos 10 minutos de su casa  para ir donde tiene el  cafetín donde vende pupusas,y regresa a su casa como las 5: 00 pm.ella cuenta que su sueño es tener su  tienda fuerte,

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación campo, es para comprar de 5 sacos  de maíz, 2 de frijoles, 2 quintales de arroz, 4 cajas de jabón de lavar ropa, 10 fardos de lejía, 10 fardos de detergente,3 garrafas de aceite,2 cajas de tomate, 5 cajas de sopas, 2 quintales de azúcar,3 fardos de papel higiénico,1 fardo de platos descartables, 3 estantes,10 cartones de huevos, 2 quintales de sal,1 caja de pasta de diente, 2cajas de fideos,cubitos, ademas quiere mejorar el local.

El préstamo, suplirá la necesidad, de poder mejorar su tienda, pues hay muchos productos que se los buscan y no los tiene,pero con el préstamo podrá darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes. podrá tener mejores ganancias y ofrecerle mejor calidad de vida a su familia.


su sueño es tener su casa de ladrillo, pues la que hoy tiene es de adobe,a demas sueña con tener un minisuper, también sueña con un carro para transportar los productos, de la tienda.
texts.en:
María is twenty-eight years old, is married, and has two children.  She has been making a living in trade for about seven years.  Before this, she made a living in domestic services.  When she married, she wanted to help her husband and first began making stuffed tortillas with her mother-in-law.  Later, she also learned to make hamburgers and Mexican cakes.  She than set up a small shop with her husband.  They began with fifty dollars.  Every day, it has grown, and they have installed a grinding mill.  They do this so that they can always bring food home to their family.

She says that her life is a little difficult.  She gets up at 5:00am to attend to her customers that arrive to buy bread for breakfast.  In the afternoon, she goes about ten minutes away from her house to go to a cafeteria where she sells her stuffed tortillas.  She returns to her home at about 5:00pm.  She says that her dream is to have her own, strong store.

The loan that she is requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy five sacks of corn, two sacks of beans, 2 quintales (about 100 kilos) of rice, 4 boxes of soap to wash clothing, 10 bundles of bleach, 10 bundles of detergent, 3 demijohns of oil, 2 boxes of tomatoes, 5 boxes of soup, 2 quintales of sugar, 3 bundles of toilet paper, 1 bundle of disposable plates, 3 shelves, 10 cartons of eggs, 2 quintales of salt, 1 box of toothpaste, 2 boxes of noodles, and ice cube trays.  She also wants to improve her store premises.  

The loan will supply her with what she needs and will help her to be able to improve her store.  There are many products that customers ask for that she does not have.  With the loan, she will be able to provide a better service to her clients.  She will be able to make better profits and to offer a greater quality of life to her family.

Her dream is to have a house made of brick.  The house she currently has is made of adobe.  She also dreams of having a mini supermarket, and of having a car in order to transport her products from the store.

loans.use: to restock her store, and to also improve her premises.

loans.name: Em

texts.en:
Em, 49, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a driver for hire.

Em has been running a general store in front of her house for twenty years. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more different household items (sanitation products, beverages and instant food) to better satisfy her customers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her children to school.

loans.use: To buy household items such as sanitation products, beverages and instant food.

loans.name: Phung

texts.en:
Phung is a 53-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and three children in Ho Chi Minh City. To support their family, Phung and her husband earn an income by raising milking cows. They started this business 15 years ago. 

Phung would like to take a loan to expand her current business. With the loan, she will repair the barn. Phung hopes that through the loan, her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: To repair the barn.

loans.name: Thom

texts.en:
Thom, 55, is married and has four children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband started a general store 30 years ago. She sells household items such as shampoo, detergents, sanitation and personal products, food and beverages. 

She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a variety of products to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in making a new activity and help her to earn income for her family. 

Anh would like to take a further loan to buy new equipment for her business of taking care of children of the people in her community. She will use a part of the loan to provide school fees for her children. 

She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy equipment for her business and to pay her child's school fees.

loans.name: Nguyen

texts.en:
Nguyen's previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. 

Now she is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. 
 
She hopes that her new loan will assist her to increase the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of products, in particular confectionery and beverages to stock her store.

loans.name: Omar De Jesus

texts.es:
Omar, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo para continuar invirtiendo en su oficio; este le permitirá comprar los materiales agrícolas oportunos para la agricultura, tales como; abono, insecticidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, herbicidas, entre otros; esto ayudara a obtener una mejor producción.
El efecto del crédito anterior fue positivo, ya que logro adquirir todo lo necesario para trabajar; las circunstancias familiares han mejorado, por lo que las condiciones económicas se han optimizado.
texts.en:
Omar is faced with the need for a new loan in order to continue investing in his work.  This loan will allow him to buy the appropriate farming materials for his fields, like fertilizer, insecticide, pesticide, pest-control substances, herbicide, and other items.  These products will help him to improve production.

The effect of the previous loan was positive.  He was able to acquire everything necessary for his work.  His familial situation and economic conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, pesticide, pest-control substances, herbicide, and other items.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung is a 40-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband and two children in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns a living working as a machinist. Dung earns an income by raising milking cows. She started this business 12 years ago. 

Dung would like to take a loan to expand her current business. With the loan, she will buy a milking cow. Phung hopes that through the loan, her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and enable her to set aside some savings.

loans.use: To buy a milking cow.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en: Thuy, a 40-year-old married woman, lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She has two children. She supports her family by running a business of processing  clothes. Thuy requests a loan to purchase a sewing machine. This will enable her to offer a better range of products to her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and she can earn additional income to reinvest in her business and save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Ngoc

texts.en:
Ngoc would like to take a further loan to repair her family's scooter, to buy soft drinks to sell to her customers, and to pay her children's school fees. 

Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her to increase the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to repair her family's scooter, to buy soft drinks to sell to her customers, and to pay her children's school fees.

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong, 52, is married and has been supporting her family by operating a beauty shop in the local community. Her husband earns a living working as a guard. Hong lives with her daughter and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Hong has been in her business for eighteen years. She plans to use this loan to buy a new hair dryer machine. In the future, she would like to expand her business and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a new hair dryer.

loans.name: Flutur

texts.en:
Flutur is a 48-year-old villager and the mother of four children who wants to buy a dairy cow with some financial help through Kiva’s lenders. This will be her first loan.

Flutur has been practicing a livestock/agricultural type of activity for the past 15 years. Here is what she shared with the loan officer who interviewed her: “livestock is not easy at all because in addition to looking after the animals, we’ve got to milk them and sell the raw milk every day going door-to-door trying to sell to residents of a main nearby city. We also have to make cheese and cottage cheese ourselves, and try to sell this as well. So, all these activities require some daily hard work in almost all seasons around the year, and this is shown on me; I look so much older for my age, unfortunately,”

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Mira

texts.en:
Mira has been in the animal husbandry type of activity for the past three years and her goal is that soon she can expand the number of animals. But for now, she wants to add more dairy cows and to buy fodder with this loan.

Here it is what she said to the loan officer: “I want to invest in buying more dairy cows and start making cheese myself and selling it, instead of selling raw milk like I do now. For the moment it’s okay, though, I am content with the activity and the income I make out of it. This income enables me to raise and educate my three children who are still attending schools. We are together with my husband in it and this makes it easier for me. This will be my first loan and I am happy to request it because I will add some more cows.”

loans.use: to add more dairy cows and buy fodder for the animals.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her to increase the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.
