loans.use: To buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as food and beverages to stock her store.

loans.name: Hoang

texts.en: Hoang is a 46-year-old married woman living in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns a living working for a public service company. Hoang is running a general store, which she has done for 10 years. She would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as snack foods and confectionery, to stock her general store. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of basic goods, such as snack foods and confectionery, to stock her general store.

loans.name: Thoa

texts.en:
Thoa, 26, is married and has one son. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Thoa and her husband have been running a general store in their community for 10 years. They sell household items to people. 

She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety and quantity of new products to stock her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of new products to stock her store and better satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Phuoc

texts.en: Phuoc would like to take a further loan to repair his house. His previous loan enabled him to increase his sales and earn a higher income to support his family. He hopes that another loan will assist him in improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to repair his house.

loans.name: Shyqyri

texts.en:
Shyqyri is starting up a business; buying agricultural fresh produce from the villagers around and selling it to the local markets of a nearby main city. He already has a transportation vehicle, and the loan he is requesting from Kiva lenders would be invested on buying produce for selling. 

According to his analysis of the market, he is certain that this activity will be a win-win situation and go well because it will allow farmers the time and energy to focus on their farming, compared to what they have been doing so far - farming plus finding ways to transport their produce every day before 5 am, which can be exhaustive. 

Shyqyri is in his early fifties and has four children who still attend schools.

loans.use: to buy fresh agricultural produce and sell it to the local market

loans.name: Fatmir

texts.en:
Fatmir is a 35-year-old married father of two children, ages 6 and 2 .  He is requesting a loan to build a stable for his goats. 

He loves the animal husbandry activity, and specifically that of the goats. Quoted below is the conversation between him and the loan officer: 
“I started this activity almost ten years ago; I find so much joy even by looking at the goats and their babies. They are hard to manage, though, because they are very fast at moving, they basically run. But running after them, it keeps me fit too. I also enjoy making the cheese out of their milk that is very healthy, without much fat and cholesterol. So many people nowadays prefer such kind of cheese versus the cow or sheep one.”

Fatmir is requesting a loan for the first time to buy fodder for his goats.

loans.use: to buy fodder for the goats

loans.name: Maa Gouri Group

texts.en:
In the year 2011, five self-motivated women entrepreneurs of Bolangir town of Bolangir district in Odisha, India formed a group named Maa Gouri to access loans from Mahashakti Foundation to expand their existing business. Nalani, a most active lady, is one of them. She is standing on the extreme left with raised hand in the photograph. Nalani, aged 35 years, is a very energetic lady who lives with her husband; they have one son of 11 years of age who is continuing his studies in an English medium school. 

Nalani has been running a varied business of tailoring, a computer and Xerox center, and an Art and Music School for the last six years with the active help of her husband. She is directly concerned with the tailoring center. She takes order from the customers for stitching of ladies garments only. Due to her timely delivery and quality stitching, her reputation is increasing day by day. Being an educated woman she also helps her husband in managing the art and music school and computer and Xerox center. 

Nalani’s present dream is to give better education to her only son, so she is ceaselessly working for income generation. From the present loan she has planned to purchase raw materials like cloth, thread, and buttons, etc. for her tailoring center and accessories for the computer and Xerox center. She is confident that this investment must help her to increase her income. Nalani hopes to save enough money to establish the Art and Music school. 

The other four members of the group are Prema, Aladini, Kuni and Ratnamani who are involved in vegetable vending, Badi/papad making and selling, a betel nut shop and electrical & egg centre respectively.

loans.use: To pay for computer accessories, cloth, thread, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Dhurata

texts.en:
Dhurata has four young children and she is forty. They live in a village in the southeastern part of the country. Their region has been known for their traditional ‘melt in your mouth pies’ that are baked in a very primitive way. 

Here is the process; after they burn wood, on top of the coals, they put the dish and cover it with a lid called ‘saç’ with coals on top of that and ‘voila’ whether there was spinach or cheese or tomato with onions filling in the pie, it was just something else. It has also been traditional in their region that women wore an apron just like Dhurata in the picture. 

Up to now, Dhurata has had goats at home and she wants to add some dairy cows also. So far she has been selling the raw milk to some dairy farm in their vicinity where they produce goat cheese, specifically.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Tot

texts.en:
Tot, 47 years old, is married and has two children. She lives in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a driver for hire. 

She supports her family through the income she earns from running a food stall, selling meals to the people in her community. She began this business seven years ago. 

Tot intends to take a loan to buy food and furniture for her stall. The additional materials will enable her to increase her production and sales. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food and furniture for her food stall.

loans.name: Hiep

texts.en:
Hiep's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. 

She would like to take a further loan to buy supplies for her beauty salon. She hopes that another loan will assist her to increase the size of her business and attract new customers. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Sadith

texts.es:
Sadith, de 30 años, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Wilfredo y sus 4 hijos a quienes desea brindarles una buena calidad de vida. Sadith se dedica a la venta de refrescos y helados elaborados con frutas regionales como anona, aguaje, guineos, maracuyá y piña.  Para esto cuenta con una refrigeradora que compró con sus ahorros, ahí conserva a bajas temperaturas todos los productos que ofrece para que siempre estén refrescantes y al gusto del cliente. En la mañanas prepara todo lo necesario usando frutas de buena calidad y los vende por las tardes en los parques o colegios cercanos a su vivienda usando envases refrigerantes. Inició su trabajo hace 2 años y desde entonces lo realiza sola. Por fortuna logra vender diariamente gran parte de todos los helados que prepara. Le gusta su actividad ya que siente que su trabajo esta dando los frutos que esperaba, considera que le esta yendo muy bien ya que tiene buenas ventas, genera buenos ingresos económicos y además progresa cada día mas, con el paso del tiempo espera tener una tienda donde pueda vender sus productos sin tener que salir a las calles.
En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está muy emocionada al saber que hay personas que le brindan un respaldo económico para continuar desarrollando su actividad laboral, así mismo se compromete a ser una socia puntual y responsable con el pago de sus cuotas.
El monto solicitado lo invertirá en su totalidad en la compra de algunos ingredientes como azúcar y frutas regionales para elaborar los deliciosos chupetes que pone a la venta.
texts.en: Sadith is 30 years old and lives in a house of her own with her husband, Wilfred, and their 4 children, whom she wants to give a better life. She sells soft drinks and iced lollipops made with regional fruit such as custard apple, moriche palm fruit, green bananas, passion fruit, and pineapple. To make her wares, she has a fridge she bought with her savings, where she keeps all her products at low temperatures so as to always have refreshing and tasty items for the customers. In the morning, Sadith makes everything she needs, using good-quality fruit, and goes out in the afternoon with a cooler to sell her wares in parks or in front of schools in her vicinity. She started this business two years ago and has always worked alone. Fortunately, she manages to sell most of her production on the same day she makes it. She loves her business because she feels that her hard work is finally paying off. She considers herself successful, since sales and profits are good, and the business grows a bit more every day. In time, she hopes to have a shop of her own, where she could stay instead of having to go out to sell her wares. Sadith asks for a loan of 1,500 soles, and says she is deeply moved by the fact that there are people ready to help her make her business grow, which is why she vows to always be punctual in her repayments and to use the money responsibly. Thus, the whole sum will go toward buying the ingredients she needs to make her delicious drinks and lollipops, such as sugar and regional fruit.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as sugar and regional fruit.

loans.name: Petrit

texts.en:
Petrit is requesting a loan of 250,000 Albanian Lek in order to invest in dairy cows. These cows will be an addition to his existing herd of the same animals.

Petrit is a villager living in the vicinity of a main city in southeastern Albania. The village under the communist era was considered a picturesque place to visit; it had a river running through the village, with some centuries-old oak trees. Then, with the changes of the leadership styles and the rapid modernization, many objects that once were considered special turned into almost nothing until some sort of stabilization kicked in the recent years and those very same objects started to be maintained again by the government or local agencies.

Petrit is 41, married, and has two children.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow and fodder for his animals

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y su esposo tiene 30 años de edad, disfruta de dos hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 5 y 7 años. Ella, se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de tamales, pasteles de carne, tortillas, el oficio lo realiza todos los días, actividad que lo aprendió con su madre, lo desempeña desde hace 10 años.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar la materia prima necesaria, tales como: maíz, carne, elotes, aceite, condimentos, entre otros; esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar su producción y obtener mejores ingresos.
Su sueño es ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y fortalecer mas el negocio.
texts.en:
Ana is 27 years old. She is married, and her husband is 30. She has two children, ages 5 and 7. She makes her living making and selling tamales, meat pies, and tortillas. She does this activity every day; she learned it from her mother and has been doing this for 10 years.  
The loan she is requesting will allow her to buy necessary raw materials, such as corn, meat, oil, condiments, among others. This investment will allow her to increase her production and make more income.
Her dream is to give her family a better quality of life and to strengthen her business.

loans.use: to buy  corn, meat, oil, condiments, among others.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, vive con su familia, está casada y disfruta de dos hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 13 y 18 años. Ella, se dedica  a la venta de ropa, lo cual lo realiza en su casa y asimismo vende antojitos, tales como: pupusas, tostadas y esto lo lleva a cabo por las tardes, tambien vende peliculas y cds, cuenta con dos años de poseer el negocio.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar variedad de ropa, tales como: blusas, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, trajes para niñas, entre otros; esta inversión le ayudará a obtener mejores ingresos e incrementar su inventario. 
Su sueño es fortalecer su negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
María lives with her family; she is married with two children ages 13 and 18. She sells clothing from her home. In the afternoons, she also sells food such as pupusas [a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans] and toast. She also sells movies and CDs. She has had this business for two years.
This loan will allow her to buy a variety of clothing such as blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, and girls' outfits. This investment will help her to obtain a greater income and expand her inventory.
Her dream is to strengthen her business and offer her family a  better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, girls' outfits, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de mas capital de trabajo para su oficio de crianza de pollos; esta inversión le ayudara a comprar pollos, concentrado, vitaminas, antibióticos, entre otros.
El préstamo anterior fue de mucha ventaja, ya que logro incrementar los inventarios y obtener mayores ingresos; sus condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
José needs a new loan because he needs more working capital for raising chickens. This investment will help him to buy chickens, chicken feed, vitamins, antibiotics, and other items.
His previous loan helped him a great deal. He was able to increase his inventory and obtain a greater income. His economic conditions and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy chickens, chicken feed, vitamins, antibiotics, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a freezer, chairs, and tables.

loans.name: Osman

texts.en:
Osman, who lives in a village close by a main city, is requesting a loan for the first time to add one more dairy cow to his existing herd of three cows. 

“I could not afford any sort of loans before, but now that the golden opportunity has been given to me to be a beneficiary of such a loan with lower rates,  then why not; I do not have to worry as much as I would have, if things were the same as before. I appreciate very much the opportunity, the organizations that have offered me such a leniency and the lenders,” is what Osman said while being interviewed by the loan officer.

Osman is 49 and married; he has two children almost grown-ups now. He has been selling raw milk at the local market of a nearby city for almost ten years now.

loans.use: to add one more milk cow to the existing herd of three cows.

loans.name: Maa Tulashi Group

texts.en:
Minati lives at Bhawanipatna the district headquarter of Kalahandi district Odisha, India. She is a headstrong and confident lady. The lady standing at the extreme right, raising her hand is Minati. She is 40 years old and lives with her husband and one daughter aged 13 and one son aged 12. 

Minati is doing tailoring as well as giving training as a tutor to girls at her home for the last two years. Minati gets a monthly income of Rs.6,000 (INR) from the above business. But that is not enough for the household expenses. Minati also wants to give better education to her children to make their careers bright. She needs financial support from Mahashakti to purchase more tailoring machines (Pico and interlock machines) and cloth. This will be her third loan.

In the year 2010, Minati along with three women formed a group named Maa Tulashi to access loans from Mahashakti Foundation to expand their business. In future she wants to be a professional tailoring tutor. 

The other three members of the group Banita, Joshna and Ratnamanjari need loans for a ladies' garments business, tailoring and rice businesses respectively.

loans.use: to purchase more tailoring machines (Pico and interlock machines) and cloth.

loans.name: Cerilo

texts.en:
Cerilo is a 53 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. Cerilo owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting bananas, corn, and coconut, which he sells to earn a living. He has been farming for many years and earns 8,000 PHP a month. 

Cerilo joined GDMPC in 2009 and is requesting a new loan for 15,000 PHP, which he will use to purchase fertilizer and weeding maintenance items. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and weeding maintenance items

loans.name: Alva

texts.es:
Alva, de 40 años de edad, está casada con Alexander quien es empleado y padre de sus 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. Alva se dedica a la confección de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional. Para empezar con su negocio compró una maquina de coser con sus ahorros, la cual instaló en su casa propia donde atiende a sus clientes quienes la buscan por los detalles que aplica a cada prenda, a logrado ganarse la aceptación de sus clientes habituales quienes la recomiendan con otras personas. Se inició en esta labor hace 2 años en y hasta el momento lo viene realizando ella sola. Considera rentable su actividad por las ganancias económicas que recibe. Le gusta la confección porque le permite mantenerse ocupada en todo momento, además las ganancias económicas que obtiene le sirven para apoyar a su pareja en solventar los gastos de su hogar. Comenta que le incomoda un poco el cansancio físico que tiene en ocasiones debido a que pasa muchas horas sentada, a pesar de ello, no se desanima y continua trabajando y esforzándose. Tiene planes de continuar con su negocio y comprarse otras maquinas de coser para dar un mejor acabado a las prendas que confecciona. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3000, está muy emocionada al saber que hay personas que le brindan un respaldo económico para continuar desarrollando su actividad laboral, así mismo se compromete a ser una socia puntual y responsable con el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales de confección como telas, hilos, agujas, botones, blondas, elásticos, aplicaciones y otros de acuerdo al requerimiento de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Alva, 40 years old, is married to Alexander, a worker and father to Alva's three children.  The family lives together in their own house. Alva makes a living producing clothes for men, women and children, having learned the trade at an education centre.  To start the business, Alva used her savings to buy a sewing machine.  It is now installed in her home, where her customers come to order each clothing item.  Alva has become accepted by regular customers, who recommend her services to other people.  Alva started this work two years ago and, up until now, she has been working alone.  Alva believes that her work is profitable because the money she earns allow her to support her husband with household costs.  Alva tells us that she sometimes finds the work physically tiring as she spends many hours seated.  In spite of this, though, she does not feel discouraged and continues working and putting in a lot of effort.  Alva plans to continue with her work and to buy other sewing machines in order to give a better finish to her clothes.  On this occasion Alva is applying for a loan of 3000 Nuevo Soles.  She is very excited to learn that there are people out there that can provide her with financial support in order to continue with her work.  Alva promises to be punctual and responsible with her repayments.

Alva will use this loan to buy material, threads, needles, buttons, blond lace, elastic and other materials that she needs for her customers.

loans.use: to buy material, thread, needles, buttons, and more.

loans.name: Deisy Lorena

texts.es:
Deisy, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo para continuar en su negocio de venta de sorbetes de la nevería; esta inversión le ayudara a  comprar mercadería tales como: sorbetes, paletas, conos, siberianos, entre otros.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo a incrementar la clientela y sus ganancias las invierte en los gastos básicos del hogar. El crédito otorgado por Kiva le permitió mejorar las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares.
texts.en:
Deisy needs a new loan because she needs more working capital to continue with her ice cream business. This investment will allow her to buy more merchandise such as: sorbets, popsicles, cones, and ice cream bars.
Her previous loan helped her to increase her clientele and her income, and she invested her earnings in basic household costs. This loan on Kiva will allow her to improve her economic conditions and family circumstances.

loans.use: to buy sorbets, popsicles, cones, ice cream bars, and other items.

loans.name: Gricelda Yamileth

texts.es:
Gricelda, requiere de más capital de trabajo, por lo que solicita un nuevo préstamo para invertir en la granja de pollos; esto le ayudara a comprar gallinas ponedoras y concentrados para alimentarlas.
El crédito anterior fue favorable, ya que logro fortalecer su negocio  y aumentar sus ganancias, estas las invierte en los gastos básicos del hogar; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Gricelda needs more working capital, so she is requesting a new loan to invest in her chicken farm. This will help her to buy laying hens and chicken feed.
Her previous loan was helpful. She was able to strengthen her business and increase her income. She invested her income in basic household costs; her economic conditions and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy laying hens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Jorge De Jesus

texts.es:
Jorge, requiere optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo para la agricultura, ya que iniciara la siembra de granos básicos; esta le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios tales como: abono, insecticidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas, entre otros.
El  crédito anterior fue positivo, ya que logro obtener mejores ingresos y esto los invierte en los gastos básicos de hogar, asimismo la producción incremento. Las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Jorge needs a new loan because he needs more working capital for agriculture. He is about to start sowing basic grains. This loan will allow him to buy the necessary agricultural supplies such as manure, insecticides, pesticides, and fungicides.
His previous loan had a positive impact. He was able to obtain a better income, and he invested this in basic household costs. His production also improved. His economic conditions and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy manure, insecticides, pesticides, and fungicides, among other items.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en:
Monicah lives in Malindi, Kenya. She is 28 years old, married and blessed with one child. She has been running a grocery store in her neighborhood for the last eight months. She has a vision to be running a wholesale business in the next five years. 

She knew Milango through friends, and she decided to join to be able to access credit to fund the business. She now seeks a loan to buy kale, tomatoes and onions for her grocery store. 

The challenge that she faces in the business is that during the low season, customers are few and her income is also limited. The extra income that she will raise from the business will help improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy kale, tomatoes and onions for her grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy plastic items like cups, plates and cooking pots.

loans.name: Alfreda

texts.en:
Alfreda works hard to support her family. She is widowed and she has a general store business in the Philippines.

Alfreda requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like soft drinks, milk, noodles, egg, canned goods, etc.

Alfreda has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Alfreda would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell like soft drinks, milk, noodles, egg, canned goods, etc

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 25 years old, married  and has one child who is in school.

Christine is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Christine requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Christine has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed twice in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Christine would like to save enough money to ensure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is 52 years old and married with three children.

Evangeline is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Evangeline requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Evangeline has been raising pigs for eight years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva to sustain her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
María, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo; esta inversión le ayudara a comprar frutas y verduras, tales como: plátanos, manzanas, entre otros, también pescado. 
El efecto del crédito anterior fue positivo, ya que logro adquirir mercadería para la satisfacción de los clientes; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
María needs a new loan because she needs more working capital. This investment will help her to buy fruits and vegetables such as bananas and apples, as well as fish.
Her previous loan had a positive impact. She was able to acquire merchandise to satisfy her customers. Her economic conditions and family circumstances have improved.

loans.use: to buy bananas, apples, and other fruits as well as fish.

loans.name: Gricelda De Jesus

texts.es:
Gricelda, está casada y tiene una hija de 14 años de edad, no recibe ayuda del extranjero. Ella, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pupusas, dicha actividad   la inicio como sustento para la familia y lo realiza de 4:00pm a 8:00pm, lo desempeña desde hace 4 años.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar la materia prima, tales como: chicharrón, maíz, frijoles, loroco, entre otros; esta inversión le ayudara a mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas.
Su sueño es optimizar el negocio y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Gricelda is married with one 14-year-old daughter. She does not receive support from abroad. She makes and sells pupusas [a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans]. She started this business to support her family, and works from 4:00 pm to 8:00 pm. She has been doing this for four years.
This loan will allow her to buy basic supplies such as chicharrón [pork rinds or cracklings], corn, beans, loroco [a Central American vine flower bud], and other items. This investment will help her to improve her business and increase her sales.
Her dream is to optimize her business and obtain a better income.

loans.use: to buy chicharrón, corn, beans, loroco, and other items.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther lives in Malindi, Kenya, where she runs a retail shop. She is married and blessed with two children. Both of the children attend school. Her husband is also employed and earns a salary. She has been in the business for six years now. 

She knew Milango through friends at a time she wanted funding for the business. She now seeks a loan to buy sugar, rice, salt and other retail products for the shop. Her aim is to open other branches of her business and spread it in major towns. The major challenges for her in the business are competition and creditors not honoring their debts.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, salt and other retail products.

loans.name: Zonia

texts.es: Zonia, de 43 años  de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 24 y 22 años de edad y junto a ellos vive cómodamente en su casa propia. Zonia se dedica a la venta de bebidas. Semanalmente llega el carro repartidor de una empresa cervecera hasta su local de atención ubicado en su hogar. Por fortuna, tiene una amplia vivienda hasta donde llegan deportistas de diversas disciplinas quienes luego de jugar van a refrescarse a su tienda. Realiza la venta directa de las bebidas gracias a que cuenta con algunas mesas y sillas en donde atiende cómodamente a sus consumidores. Lleva trabajando en esta actividad  más de 5 años y lo hace sola, además tiene otros negocios complementarios como la venta de golosinas y la crianza de aves. Le gusta lo que hace, pues brinda a sus clientes productos de reconocida calidad con mucha responsabilidad y medidas de seguridad complementarias, además con todo lo que ofrece puede tener buenas ventas y con esto mejorar los ingresos que necesita en la economía de su hogar. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000, está agradecida y contenta al saber que sigue contando con el apoyo financiero que necesita para avanzar con el progreso de su negocio. Con el monto solicitado comprará gaseosas y otras bebidas refrescantes para continuar con las ventas en su negocio.
texts.en: Zonia, age 43, is a single mother. She has two children ages 24 and 22 and lives with them comfortably in her own home. Zonia sells drinks. The delivery truck arrives weekly from a beer company directly to her business, which is located in her home. Luckily, she has a large home. After playing sports, sportsmen from every sport go to her store to get refreshments. She has some tables and chairs, so she is able to provide comfortable customer service. She has had this business for over five years and works alone. She also has other complementary businesses such as candy sales and raising birds. She likes what she does; she offers her customers recognized, quality products with a great deal of responsibility and security. Because she sells so much, she has good sales and is able to bring in a good income for her household. She is requesting 2000 soles and is grateful and happy to know that she continues to have the financial support she needs to move forward with her business. With this loan, she will buy pop and other refreshments to continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy pop and other refreshments.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria nació en la ciudad de Cusco pero ahora vive en la hermosa ciudad de Paucartambo, ella tiene 49 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo, ella tiene una pequeña librería y heladería y le va muy bien, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen del Rosario” desde hace varios entonces en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo helados, gaseosas, agua mineral, papeles, lapiceros, cuadernos y otras cosa más, ella agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Maria was born in the city of Cusco but currently lives in the beautiful city of Puacartambo. She is 49 and in a common-law marriage. She has two children and is a hard-working and enterprising mother who supports her children through her hard work. She has a small and very successful bookstore and ice cream shop. She has belonged to the "Virgen del Rosario" communal bank for some time now. She needs this loan for the purchase of merchandise such as ice cream, pop, mineral water, paper, pens, and notebooks. She is grateful for this loan and values it, and promises to repay her monthly quotas very responsibly.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as ice cream, pop, mineral water, paper, pens, and notebooks.

loans.name: Bernadete

texts.en:
A $600 loan is offered to Bernadete to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as chicken pieces, buffalo meat, and pork. She has been involved in business activities since 2002. She feels comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Bernadete independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy chicken pieces, buffalo meat, and pork

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a restaurant business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her restaurant business.

Lolita has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from her general store.

Lolita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of repairing and renovating her family home in the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
La señora Eufemia es de estado civil casada, tiene 34 años de edad, de escolaridad 6to. primaria, tiene 3 hijos y de llos 2 estan estudiando, se dedica a atender su tienda de artículos de consumo diario, inició este negocio con un capital pequeño que le concedió su esposo y hasta la fecha lleva 8 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

Organiza un grupo y decide solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de artículos tales como: azucar, granos básicos, embutidos, pastas, detergente, papel higiénico, gaseosas, entre otros, espera en el futuro tener una abarroteria. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a tienda, venta de ropa y crianza de animales domésticos.
texts.en:
Eufemia is 34, married, and has a grade six education. She has three children, two of whom are in school. She runs a store where she sells basic household goods. She started this business with a small amount of capital that her husband gave her, and currently has 8 years' experience. She counts on her husband's support; he is a merchant.
She has organized this group and decided to request a loan which will be used to buy products such as: sugar, basic staples, canned goods, pasta, detergent, toilet paper, and pop. In the future, she hopes to have a grocery store.
The other group members have stores, sell clothing, and raise domestic animals.

loans.use: to buy household products.

loans.name: Astrid

texts.es: Astrid, de 21 años, está casada y tiene una hija pequeña con quien vive en la casa de su suegra. Astrid se dedica a la confección de ropa, muchas veces espera que el cliente la visiten y le pidan un diseño o la refacción de alguna prenda, en otras ocasiones ella misma se inspira en nuevos diseños y crea su propia ropa para luego venderlos entre sus clientes, familiares y amigos. Su taller esta ubicado en la casa de su suegra en donde acondicionó un lugar para trabajar tranquila. Lleva realizando este negocio por 2 años y con el tiempo aprendió a darle un buen acabado a su trabajo. Paralelamente vende gaseosas y helados. Le gusta lo que hace pues se siente una mujer independiente, tiene su propio horario de trabajo y además puede generar sus propios ingresos económicos. Desea continuar realizando su trabajo y más adelante quiere establecer un taller más grande con más máquinas de coser y más trabajadores para así aumentar su producción. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, por ello agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes laborales, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales como hilos, agujas, botones, telas, forros y blondas para continuar confeccionando sus prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Astrid is 21 years old, married and has a young daughter.  They all live together in her mother-in-law's house.  Astrid makes a living producing clothes with customers coming to her many times to order a particular design or to repair an item.  On others occasions, Astrid herself is inspired to make new designs and produces her own clothes to later sell to her customers, family members and friends.  Astrid's workshop is in her mother-in-law's house, where a space has been set up for her to work in peace.  Astrid has had this business for two years and, in time, has learned to give her work a  good finish.  In addition to her dressmaking work, Astrid sells fizzy drinks and ice creams.  Astrid likes her work as she feels independent.  She sets her own timetable and generates her own income.  She would like to continue with her work and, in the future, set up a larger workshop with more sewing machines and more workers in order to increase production.  Astrid is applying for a loan of 500 Nuevo Soles on this occasion.  She is grateful for the opportunity being provided so that she can make her plans a reality.  Astrid promises to make her repayments on time. Astrid will use this loan to buy materials such as threads, needles, buttons, material, lining and blond lace in order to continue producing her clothing items.

loans.use: to buy materials such as threads, needs, buttons, material, blond lace and lining.

loans.name: Jose Arquimides

texts.es:
José, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo para el cultivo de granos básicos; este le permitirá comprar materiales agrícolas, tales como: herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, abono, entre otros.
El préstamo anterior le fue de mucha utilidad, ya que la producción aumento y sus ingresos los invierte en los gastos de la alimentación y vestuario de sus hijos. Las circunstancias familiares y las condiciones económicas han mejorado.
texts.en: Jose needs a new loan because he needs more working capital so he can raise his basic grains.  This will allow him to buy farming supplies such as herbicides, pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, fertilizer and other things.   The previous loan was of great help and his production increased.  He spends his earnings on feeding and clothing his children.  The family finances have improved.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco tiene 47 años de edad, es soltero. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y a la prestación de servicios desde hace varios años, oficio que aprendió de su  padre quien ya falleció. Se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. Junto a su madre para prepararse e irse a la parcela que alquila donde pasa parte de la mañana, luego se dirige a trabajar en la tarde a cuidar una finca.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una novilla. Podrá obtener un buen ingreso para el sustento suyo ya que producirá leche. 
 Planea comprar un terreno para sembrar ya que alquila y  le resulta bastante costoso.
texts.en:
Marco is 47 and single. He has worked in agriculture and provided labour for several years. He learned this work from his late father. Marco and his mother get up at 4:00 am in order to get ready and go to the plot of land that they rent. There they spend part of the morning, and later Marco goes to care for another farm in the afternoons.
This loan, which he is requesting from Fundación Campo, is for the purchase of a young cow. He will be able to obtain a good income from this because it will produce milk.
He plans to buy a plot of land on which to sow crops; he currently rents land, and this is quite expensive.

loans.use: to buy a young cow.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 52 años, está casada y tiene 5 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Juana se inicia muy temprano, tiene su taller de confección el cual está instalado en su hogar en donde realiza el arreglo de prendas y la confección de los mismos segun el gusto del cliente. Lleva más de 30 años wn watw negocio y lo realiza sola. Lo que le gusta de este trabajo es que sus clientes le ayudan a ser mejor cada día tanto laboral como emocionalmente, además asegura que sus clientes son selectos y eso le permite recibir buenos pagos por cada una de sus prendas. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 800 soles y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará telas especiales, hilos de colores, agujas y otros materiales de confección.
texts.en:
Juana, age 52, is married and has five children with whom she lives in her own home. She starts work very early in the morning. She has a sewing workshop in her home where she makes and repairs garments based on her clients' wishes. She has had this business for over thirty years, and she works alone. What she likes about this job is that her clients help her to be better every day, both in her work and her personality. She tells us that her clients are exclusive and this allows her to make a good income from each garment she makes. 
She is requesting 800 soles, and she is grateful for this financial support to get ahead. She promises to repay her quotas punctually. With the requested loan, she will buy special fabric, coloured threads, needles, and other sewing materials.

loans.use: to buy special fabric, coloured thread, needles, and other items.

loans.name: Jose Ignacio

texts.es:
Jose tiene 39 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Imperial, la cual tiene un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de manzana. Jose es un hombre muy trabajador, sobre todo porque apoya  a sus padres, quienes no tienen muchos ingresos económicos. Desde muy joven aprendió a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente, es por ello que solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de mecánica. 

Día a día Jose trabaja en el camal municipal, lugar donde se vende la carne de ganado vacuno y porcino, Jose trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día y el cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque es muy cumplido.

Jose esta muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá colocar piso de cemento a la vivienda donde habita, con lo cual podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Estudiar una carrera universitaria y poder apoyar a sus hermanos a salir adelante”.
texts.en:
Jose is 39 and lives in the city of Imperial, which has a hot and welcoming climate. Agriculture, especially apple cultivation, is common there. Jose is a very hard-working man, because he supports his parents; they do not have many economic resources. He learned to earn his daily bread with the sweat of his brow at a very young age. This is why he only attended school until the fifth grade of secondary school. He would have liked to study to be a mechanic.
Jose works day in, day out, at the municipal slaughterhouse, where beef and pork are sold. He works around nine hours per day, and believes that he is getting ahead because he is very responsible and, above all, polite and thoughtful.
Jose is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their support he will be able to install a cement floor in his home. This will improve his family's quality of life, and he will be able to keep working toward his greatest dream: "To study at a university and to be able to help my siblings to succeed".

loans.use: to install a cement floor in his home.

loans.name: Las Amigas Del 22 Group

texts.es: Un grupo conformado por 7  mujeres  responsables a distintas actividades comerciales. Así son las integrantes del grupo comunal. “LAS AMIGAS DEL 22” una de ellas es la Sra. YNGRID de 33 años soltera  y con 2 hijos, la Sra. Yngrid  se dedica ya hace 3 años a la venta de productos de belleza en un pequeño local  todos los días con el merito de salir adelante y así poder pagar el colegio de sus hijos, Con el fruto de su esfuerzo la Sra. yngrid   ha logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar en la educación de sus hijos. Seguir mejorando su negocio, su mayor deseo es que sus hijos sean profesionales es por eso  que la Sra. Yngrid   trabaja mucho , Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar más cosméticos de belleza  y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a la Sra. Yngrid se encuentra sentada en el medio y se le distingue con chompa azul, se despide con un abraso a Kiva y Edaprospo y  agradece el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso.
texts.en:
The "Las Amigas Del 22" group is made up of seven responsible women who have distinct businesses. One of the members is Yngrid, who is 33, single, and has two children. She has sold beauty products every day for three years in a small store with the goal of getting ahead and being able to pay for her children's education. Through her hard work, Yngrid has been able to improve her home and support her children in their education. She continues to improve her business. Her greatest desire is for her children to become professionals; this is why she works so much.
She will invest this loan in the purchase of cosmetics in order to have a greater income. 
Yngrid is pictured sitting in the middle wearing a blue sweater. She says goodbye and sends a hug to Kiva and Edaprospo. She is grateful for this support, as it is making it possible for her to progress.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Irene Elizabeth

texts.es:
Irene tiene 23 años de edad vive en unión libre con el compañero y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas

Irene se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol además a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos, con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos y en balanceado para los animales.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño de Irene es tener dinero para arreglar la casa.

Le gusta bailar y ver novelas.
texts.en:
Irene is 23 and in a common-law marriage. She lives with her partner and children in the city of Ventanas, Los Rios province.
The El Laurel communal bank is located in the El Laurel district of the Zapotal Nuevo parish, belonging to the Ventanas canton. The residents work in agriculture.
Irene works in agriculture and plants corn, rice, and beans. She also raises chickens and hogs. She will invest this loan in the purchase of seeds, manure, and fertilizer for her crops, as well as feed for her animals. Loans are a great help in increasing production.
Irene's dream is to have money to fix up her house.
She enjoys dancing and watching soap operas.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, and fertilizer for her crops, as well as feed for her animals.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 38 años de edad. Está casada con Hilter quien es empleado y padre de sus 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia. María se dedica a la venta de comidas en el frontis de su vivienda, ella se levanta temprano para empezar la faena diaria, cocina durante el día para que al acercarse la noche pueda ofrecer sus platos regionales. Asegura que tiene clientes que ha podido ganar y mantener gracias a la calidad de la comida que ofrece, tiene muy buena sazón y eso hace que sus clientes le sean fieles. Lleva 3 años en está actividad y lo hace sola ya que sus hijos tienen que estudiar. Complementa este negocio con la venta de gaseosas,  aguas envasadas y helados. Le fascina hacer su trabajo por que siempre le gustó la cocina. Asegura que es muy gratificante observar el rostro de agrado que muestran sus clientes cuando consumen sus platos. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2500, está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que recibe pra seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará verduras, tubérculos y diversas carnes para continuar preparando sus deliciosos platos.
texts.en:
María, age 38, is married to Hilter, who is employed. They have three children and live together in their own home. Maria sells food in the front part of her home. She gets up early to do the daily chores, and cooks during the day so that when the night arrives she is able to offer her regional dishes. She tells us that she has been able to gain and maintain clients thanks to the quality of her food. Her food is very tasty, and this makes her customers loyal. She has had this business for three years and she works alone because her children have to study.
She complements this business with the sale of pop, bottled water, and ice cream. She loves her work because she has always enjoyed cooking. She tells us that it is very gratifying to see people's happy faces when they eat her food.
She is requesting 2500 soles. She is very happy to have this financial support to get ahead, and promises to repay her quotas punctually. With this loan, she will purchase vegetables, tubers, and various meat in order to continue preparing her delicious dishes.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, tubers, meat, and other items.

loans.name: Mujeres Independientes Group

texts.es: Luz  de 38 años de edad soltera y sin hijos, luz  se dedica ya hace 2  años a la venta de ropa  en un pequeño puesto todos los días, luz   nos cuenta que ha llegado a fidelizar a sus clientes lo cual a generando ingresos  para cubrir los gastos de su casa,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender su ropa  y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá  en comprar mas prendas de vestir y así poder tener más ingresos. A la vez a luz se le observa en la foto que está sentada a la mano derecha con pantalón rojo,  se despide con un abraso a Kiva y   diciéndoles que cumplirá todas su metas propuestas.
texts.en: Luz is 38 years old, single, and has no children.  For the past two years she has been selling clothing from a small stall every day.  She says that she has gotten loyal customers, which generates income to cover her household expenses.  In the future she would like to have her own shop where she can sell clothing and obtain greater income.  She will use the money from this loan to buy more clothing and be able to increase her income.  She appears in the photograph, seated to the right, wearing red pants.  She sends Kiva a hug and says that she will complete all of her goals.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Kombaté

texts.fr: Kombaté est un homme de 49ans. Marié, il a en charge 03 enfants âgés respectivement de 10, 7 et 05ans qui suivent toujours des études. Sa femme est revendeuse. Mr Kombaté quant à lui est frigoriste de profession. Il répare, vend des appareils frigorifiques à ses clients et sollicite un second crédit à WAGES pour acheter des machines servant à réparer les appareils et aussi acheter afin de revendre. Son souhait est d’assurer le bien – être de la famille tout en gardant pérenne son activité.
texts.en: Kombaté is a 49-year-old married man. He has three dependent children aged 10, 7 and 5 years old, and they are still in school. His wife is a retailer. Kombaté himself is a refrigeration mechanic. He repairs and sells refrigeration equipment to his customers and is seeking his second loan from WAGES to purchase machines used to repair appliances, and also to buy appliances to resell. He hopes to ensure the well being of his family while keeping his business sustainable.

loans.use: to purchase refrigeration equipment.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is 62 years old, married, and has six children, one of whom is in school. 

Florencia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Florencia requested a PHP 9,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Florencia has been raising pigs for seven years now and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Florencia would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Bahron

texts.ru: Бахрон  жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 30 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребёнка. Живёт он со своей семьёй в небольшом селе. Бахрон очень хорошо относится к своей жене и ребёнку. Он старается делать всё, что необходимо для того, чтобы они жили в достатке и имели всё необходимое. Для того, чтобы иметь доход в семье Бахрон занимается собственным бизнесом. Он занимается животноводством. Это удобный вид  бизнеса для него, потому что он имеет дом возле поля, где свободно можно  пасти своих скот. Он выращивает этих скот и потом продаёт полученное от них мясо и молоко.  На сегодня у Бахрона в наличии имеется 6 голов крупно рогатого скота. В этом бизнесе также ему помогает жена. Она целый день работает по дому и ухаживает за скотом. В свободное время Бахрон также работает на строительных объектах помощником мастера. От этой работы он получает дополнительный заработок. Сейчас Бахрон мечтает построить для своей семьи большой и благоустроенный дом. Но для этого ему необходима большая сумма денег. Поэтому он планирует расширить свой бизнес животноводства, чтобы накопить достаточную сумму для построения дома. По этой причине Бахрон обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку рогатого скота. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку его бизнеса.
texts.en: Bahron is a cheerful 30-year old man. He is married and has one child. He lives with his family in a small village. Bahron treats his wife and child very well. He attempts to do everything in order for them to have a comfortable life and their needs to be taken care of. As a source of income for his family, Bahron has his own business. He raises livestock. This is a good type of business for him because his house in near a field where cattle can graze. He fattens his cattle and then sells meat and dairy products. At present he has six heads of large cattle. His wife helps him in the business. All day she does household chores and takes care of the animals. In his free time, Bahron also works at construction site as an assistant foreman. He receives additional cameo fro this work. At present Bahron’s dream is to build a big and comfortable house for his family. But he needs a large sum of money to do this. For this reason Bahron has applied to Arvand for a loan intended for purchasing cattle. He thanks Arvand in advance for supporting its business.

loans.use: to buy  cattle.

loans.name: Progresistas Group

texts.es: Raquel es integrante del grupo progresistas, un grupo pagador, responsable y sus integrantes son mujeres que luchan para salir adelante. Ella es una mujer casada de 42 años, y tiene 3 hijos todos son mayores de edad; Raquel se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, tiene 4 años con el negocio y con el crédito desea extender y ampliar la tienda.
texts.en:
Raquel is a member of the group “Progresistas” (Progressives), which has been responsible with its payments. The members are women who strive to move forward.

Raquel is a 42-year-old woman who is married and has three grown children. She sells groceries and has been in business for four years. Raquel wants to use her loan to extend and expand her store.

loans.use: to extend and expand her store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy grocery items for her husband's grocery business.

loans.name: Akouélé

texts.fr: Akouélé vit avec son conjoint et leur seul enfant de 16ans à Lomé. Ce dernier est scolarisé. Akouélé s’est donnée à l’apprentissage de la couture et après sa formation, elle répond aux demandes des clients à domicile. Elle désire s’approvisionner en machine à coudre c’est pour cela, elle demande son premier crédit à WAGES. le profit tiré dans le service offerts à ses clients lui permettra d’agrandir son activité et d’assurer les besoins vitaux de la famille.
texts.en:
Akouélé lives with her husband and their only child, who is 16 years old, in Lome. Their child attends school. Akouélé herself has learned sewing, and after completing her training, now responds to the requests of her customers from her home.

She wants to purchase a sewing machine, and so has come to WAGES to request her first loan. The income she earns from the services she offers to customers will allow her to expand her business and ensure the basic needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Corina Fernanda

texts.es:
Corina es una joven de 20 años de edad, la cual vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad de clima cálido y acogedor. Corina es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que cada día trabaja con mucho entusiasmo en su pequeño negocio de venta de dulces, con el cual apoya a sus padres y sobre todo solventa sus gastos de estudio, ya que ella se encuentra estudiando la carrera de administración, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas, sobre todo atiende su negocio en el día ya que por las noches acude a su centro de estudios; ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable.

Corina está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar una computadora, de esta manera podrá tener los materiales necesarios para poder estudiar y asi seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y tener un negocio propio”.
texts.en:
Corina is a young woman of 20 years. She lives in the city of Ica, a city with a warm, agreeable climate. Corina is a youth with a lot of desire to get ahead and because of this she works every day with enthusiasm, in a small business selling sweets. By doing this she supports her parents and moreover pays for her studies. She is studying administration. She works about 8 hours each day and in the evenings goes to her school. She feels she is getting ahead as she is being very responsible.

Corina is very pleased with the lenders from Kiva. Thanks to their help she will be able to buy a computer and doing so, have all the materials she needs to study. Then she can continue to struggle to realize her greatest dream: "Graduate and open her own business".

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James lives in the Kisii area of Kenya. He has three children. He is a farmer, which he has been doing for five years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, tea, crops, and personal business.

James is requesting a loan from Juhudi Kilimo, which he will use to buy a dairy cow.  His biggest challenges are the lack of market and poor roads. This loan will improve his family's living standards.

As part of Juhud Kilimo's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. James owns the following: cow, poultry, motorcycle. He does not own pig, pump, bicycle, automobile. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. James has a mosquito net, TV, DVD, but he does not have electricity, solar power, running water, or a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Meet 24-year-old Rebecca from Waterloo Eastern area in Freetown. She is Single.  She began her business because she wants to create income to support herself and her parents. In 2008, Rebecca established her calling centre business.  She works at the business from 8:00am until 6:00pm, Morning to Friday. She says that the main challenges to her business are lack of finance to expand a big house.

Rebecca requires a loan in order to purchase more cards containing phone credit like Airtel for resale. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to improve her status of living and open a big shop. In the future, Rebecca plans to further her education and become a medical nurse. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more cards containing phone credit for resale.

loans.name: Sabino

texts.es:
El señor Sabino es originario del estado de San Luis Potosí, tiene 43 años de edad y tiene mas de 30 años radicando en la ciudad de Nuevo Laredo, esta casado con la señora Laura, con quien tiene tres hijos cuales ya están casados y tiene su propia familia.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para realizar los acabados del interior de la cocina de su vivienda ya que no cuenta con el dinero para realizar la mejora.
El señor Sabino recibe una pensión gubernamental por invalides, también tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de tacos mañanera  en diferentes partes de la ciudad lo atiende el señor Sabino y su esposa la señora Laura. Estos son los ingresos que generan para salir adelante.
Con la el ingreso que recibe de la pensión es para pagar el crédito y que con la ganancias de los tacos es para los gastos familiares.
Desean mejorar la calidad de vida y que su patrimonio este en las mejores condiciones y que tengan la comodidad para el y su esposa.
texts.en:
Sr. Sabino is originally from the state of San Luis Potosí. He moved to the city of Nuevo Laredo more than 30 years ago. Sabino is 43 years old and married to Sra. Laura. They have three children who are already married and have their own families.

Sabino is requesting a loan so that he can finish the interior of the kitchen in his home. However, he does not have the money to make this improvement.

Sr. Sabino receives a disability pension from the government. He also has a small taco business where he sells in mornings in different parts of the city. Sabino and his wife Laura manage this business. These forms of income help them to move forward. The income from his pension will be used to repay the loan, while the profits from the taco business will be used for family expenses.

Sabino wants to improve his quality of life and keep his property in better condition so that he and his wife can be comfortable.

loans.use: to finish the interior of his kitchen.

loans.name: Fanny Aracely

texts.es:
Fanny tiene 32 años de edad es casada tiene 3 hijos con el compañero y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas

Fanny se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol además a la crianza de pollos y cerdos, con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos y en balanceado para los animales.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño es incremetar la produccion de los cultivos y comprar mas animales.

Le gusta hacer deporte y limpiar la casa.
texts.en:
Fanny is 32 years old, married, and she and her companion have 3 children. She lives in the city of Ventanas, De los Rios province. 

Her “Laurel Tree” communal bank is located in the Laurel neighborhood of Nuevo Zapotal parish, Ventanas canton, and its members are dedicated to agriculture.

Fanny is a farmer who sows corn, rice, and beans. In addition, she raises chickens and pigs. With this loan she will invest in seeds, manure, and fertilizers for her crops and, also, in feed for her animals. The loan will be a great help for augmenting production.

Fanny's dream is to increase crop production and to purchase more animals. She likes to play sports and clean the house.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure,  and fertilizers for her crops and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Windingoudi Group

texts.fr:
Mme ZALISSA est la représentante du groupe WINDIN GOUDI. Elle se porte très bien ainsi que sa famille.  Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 11ans le moins âgé a 05ans. 02 vont à l’école et elle a 03 personnes à sa charge.
Mme est couturière. Elle exerce ce métier depuis 16ans. Mme vend aussi des bijoux et du savon. Elle s’approvisionne au marché  de secteur 10. Ses clients sont les femmes et hommes et les enfants du quartier.
Mme veut  s’acheter 01 rouleau de tissu, 01 paquet  de file, ½ rouleau d’élastique et 01 paquet de bouton.
 Elle veut  épargner ses bénéfices afin d’ouvrir un atelier de couture. Mme ambitionne  agrandir son activité et mieux s’occuper de sa famille.
texts.en:
Zalissa is the Windin Goudi group representative. She is doing very well, as is her family. She is married and the mother of 3 children, the eldest of which is 11 years old and the youngest, 5. Two of her children go to school and she is also responsible for 3 more people.

Zalissa is a seamstress. She has been in this line of work for 16 years. She also sells jewellery and soap. She gets her supplies at the Sector 10 market. Her customers are women and men and children from the neighbourhood. She would like to buy a roll of fabric, a packet of thread, half a roll of elastic and a packet of buttons. She wants to save her profits so that she can open a sewing workshop. She aims to expand her business and to take better care of her family.

loans.use: to buy a roll of fabric, a packet of thread, half a roll of elastic and a packet of buttons.

loans.name: Obidon

texts.fr: Détentrice d’un bar et revendeuse en même temps des produits d‘alimentation générale, madame Obidon âgée de 33ans sollicite un premier prêt à WAGES pour s’approvisionner en marchandises. Elle espère garder sa clientèle car elle est souvent confrontée au problème de concurrence. Elle est mariée et mère de famille d’01 enfant de 03ans.
texts.en:
Obidon is the manager of a bar and retailer of general food supplies. She is 33 years old, and is seeking her first loan from WAGES to purchase a supply of merchandise.

She hopes to maintain her customer base because she often faces the problem of competing businesses. She is married and mother of one child, who is three years old.

loans.use: to purchase general food supplies and beverages.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.pt:
Jacinto é operador de equipamento pesado numa empresa de caminhos de ferro, tem 54 anos de idade é casado e pai de 6 filhos dos quais 4 estudam e outros 2 ainda menores de idade.
Com o valor do empréstimo quer comprar cimento, chapas de zinco, e ferro para dar continuidade a contrução de sua casa.
Para conseguir realizar este projecto irá pedir mais empréstimos pois com o seu salario não seria possίvel ou levaria mais tempo para concretizá- los.
texts.en: Jacinto is a heavy machine operator in a railroad company. He is 54 years old and married, and he has six children, four of whom are still in school. He plans to use this loan to buy cement, sheet metal, and rebar to continue the construction on his house. He will request further loans to complete this project, as it would not be possible with his salary or would take much longer to achieve.

loans.use: to buy cement, sheet metal, and rebar to continue the construction on his house.

loans.name: Lazaro

texts.pt:
Lázaro é pensionista militar e trabalha como técnico veterinário numa empresa do ramo agrίcola. 
Ele é casado e tem 8 filhos dos quais 4 são maiores de idade, 3 estudam e 1 não tem ainda idade escolar.
Com o valor ira comprar cimento, chapas, barrotes, areia e rede tubarao para fazer um aviario na sua casa. 
Para o futuro tem planos de terminar a construcao do aviario mais tarde criar tambem porcos para revenvder reforcando assim a renda familias.
Diz que ira solicitar mais credito para realizacao de seu plano.
texts.en:
Lazaro has retired from the military and works as a veterinary technician in an agricultural company.
He is married and the father of eight children, four of whom are adults, three of whom are in school, and one of whom is not yet old enough to go to school.
He will use this loan to buy cement, sheet metal, joists, sand, and fishing net to build an aviary at his home.
In the future he plans to finish building the aviary and then raise pigs to sell so he can increase his family’s income.
He says that he will request more loans to carry out these plans.

loans.use: to buy cement, sheet metal, joists, sand, and fishing net to build an aviary at his home.

loans.name: Isomiddin

texts.ru: Исомиддин живет в районе Носири Хусрав в южной части Таджикистана. Ему 37 лет. Он женат, имеет одного сына и одну дочь, учащихся в школе. Вместе с ними также живут его мать и отец. Исомиддин занимается животноводством. Он закупает крупнорогатый скот, откармливает в течение 30-35 дней и продает с наценкой на скотном рынке. Ему в деятельности помогает его племянник. Исомиддин занимается данным бизнесом уже 4 года. Одновременно он вместе с отцом занимается земледелием. Сейчас в его хозяйстве имеются две коровы и два телят. Исомиддин хочет увеличить поголовье скота для расширения деятельности. Он просит кредит для закупа трех бычков с целью дальнейшего откорма и продажи. За счет полученной прибыли Исомиддин планирует провести ремонт в доме и улучшить условия проживания семьи.
texts.en: Isomiddin lives in the Nosiri Khusrav district in southern Tajikistan. He is 37, married, and has a son and a daughter who are in school. His mother and father also live with the family. Isomidden buys cattle, fattens them up for 30-35 days, and then sells them for profit at the local cattle market. His nephew helps him with his work. Isomidden has been raising cattle for four years and also plants crops with his father. He currently has two cows and two calves and wants to buy more cattle to expand the business. He has asked for a loan to buy three bulls to fatten and resell. He plans to remodel his house and improve his family's living conditions with the profits.

loans.use: to purchase three bulls and expand his business

loans.name: Laiane

texts.pt:
Laiane de  57 anos de idade, é casado e pai de 2 filhos já maiores de idade. Vive na casa própria com sua esposa. Ele e auxiliar numa empresa de caminhos de ferro.
Com o valor do credito Laiane quer comprar material eléctrico para sua casa de 1 quarto e sala e rebocar.
Tem como planos para o futuro terminar as obras de sua casa e mobilar.
Diz que gosta dos serviços da Hluvuku pois conseguiu melhorar as condições de sua casa - antes vivia numa casa feita de material precário e agora conseguiu uma com material convencional.
texts.en:
Laiane, 57 years old, is married and the father of two adult children. He lives in his own home with his wife. He is an assistant at a railroad company.
Laiane wants to use this loan to buy materials to install electricity in and plaster his small home.
In the future, he hopes to finish the work on his house and furnish it.
He says he likes Hluvuku’s services because they have allowed him to improve his home. He used to live in a house built of scraps, and now he lives in one built of standard materials.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Clemencia

texts.pt:
Clemência  de 37 anos é enfermeira, casada e mãe de 2 filhos que estudam na 3ª e 8ª classes respectivamente e vive na casa própria. Com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar cimento e janelas para continuar a construção da sua casa. No futuro pretende fazer uma dependência que passaria a servir de quarto para um dos filhos.
Diz que irá pagar pontualmente e voltar a solicitar outros créditos para poder realizar seus planos.
texts.en:
Clemência, 37 years old, is a nurse. She is married and has two children, who are in the third and eighth grades. She lives in her own home. She plans to use this loan to buy cement and windows to continue building her house. In the future she would like to add another room that will serve as a bedroom for one of her children.
She says she will make her loan payments on time and request other loans so she can carry out her plans.

loans.use: to buy cement and windows to continue building her house.

loans.name: Aida

texts.pt:
Aida tem 34 anos de idade, mãe de 5 filhos dos quais apenas 1 não estuda pois e menor de idade. Ela é trabalhadora de uma empresa do ramo agrίcola como empacotadora ha 4 anos. 
E viuva é diz ter perdido sua casa a favor da famίia do esposo tendo ficado apenas com um terreno que havia adiquirido com o falecido marido e passou a viver na casa de sua mãe contruindo a sua naquele espaço.
Com o valor do empréstimo ira comprar aros, portas, cimento e janelas para terminar sua casa.
No futuro quer  fazer instalação eléctrica na sua casa e comprar electrodomésticos para sua famÍlia.
 Diz que ira pangar pontualmente para voltar a solicitar mais emprestimos para realizar seus projetos.
texts.en: Aida is 34 years old and the mother of five children, only one of whom is still in school. She has worked as a baler for an agricultural company for four years. She is a widow and says she lost her house to her husband’s family. She has only a plot of land she and her late husband purchased, and she moved back in with her mother while she builds her own home. She will use this loan to buy doors, cement, and windows to finish her house. In the future she would like to install electricity in her house and buy appliances for her family. She says she will make her payments on time so that she can request more loans to pursue her projects.

loans.use: to buy doors, cement, and windows to finish her house.

loans.name: Miriam Del Carmen

texts.es:
Miriam es una mujer de 41 años de edad, madre de dos hijas. Ella trabaja en la agricultura desde hace varios años, fue su esposo quien le motivo a aprender. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Para ir a la parcelas donde siembra durante el resto de la mañana y sus hijos van a la escuela; mientras ella en la tarde se dedica a vender pupusas y comida típica

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar dos  Vacas  lecheras que le vende un familiar.  Con la venta de la leche mejorara su negocio lo que le generara mejores ingreso para su sustento de su familia. Ella en un futuro piensa construir un cafetín en donde venderá y atenderá mejor a sus clientes; ya que por el momento lo hace en una casa de lamina.
texts.en:
Miriam is a 41-year-old woman, mother to 2 daughters. She has worked in agriculture for various years now. It was her husband who motivated her to learn. Miriam rises at 5:00 am to work the parcels she cultivates for the rest of the morning, while her children attend school. Then afternoons, she sells typical Salvadoran dishes such as “pupusas.”

The loan she is requesting through the Campo Foundation is for purchasing 2 milk cows from a family member. Selling milk will improve her business, generating better income for sustaining her family. 

Miriam hopes to construct a cafeteria in the future where she can sell her dishes and better attend to her customers. At present she is doing so in her own house made of laminate.

loans.use: to buy 2 milk cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install new plumbing in her home.

loans.name: Oscar Alejandro

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 20 años de edad es casado con la esposa y con  los hijos viven en la cuidad de ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

La ventanilla el laurel se encuentras ubicada en el recinto el laurel de la parroquia zapotal nuevo perteneciente al cantón ventanas se dedica a labores Agrícolas

Oscar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol además a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos, con crédito le ayudado a invertir en semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes para los cultivos y en balanceado para los animales.  El crédito es de gran ayuda para aumentar la producción.

El sueño es tener dinero para comprar un terreno y seguir sembrando.

Le gusta hacer deporte con la familia.
texts.en:
Oscar, 20, is married and lives with his wife and children in Ventanas in Los Ríos province. The communal bank El Laurel is located in El Laurel in Zapotal Nuevo parish in Ventanas canton. All the members are farmers.

Oscar grows corn, rice, and beans and raises hens and pigs. The loan will help him buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and nutritious animal feed and increase production. He dreams of buy land and continue planting. He likes to play sports with his family.

loans.use: to buy seed, manure, fertilizer, and feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to waterproof her house and to paint the security bars.

loans.name: Gerardo Andres

texts.es:
Gerardo tiene 26 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

La VRC LUCHANDO JUNTOS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Zapotal nuevo, Pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a Labores Comerciales en su mayoría. 

Gerardo se dedica desde a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y arroz.Con el apoyo del credito puede tener mas productos.

Solicita el crédito para poder tener capital para la agricultura para la comprar de semillas y fertilizantes, Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a tener un beneficio para la familia.

El sueño es tener casa propia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gerardo, 26, lives in a free union and has a son. He lives with his wife and child in Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province. The communal bank Luchando Juntos (Striving Together) is located is Zapotal Nuevo in Ventanas canton. Most of the members are merchants. 

Gerardo grows corn and rice. He will buy more supplies with the loan, which will give him capital to purchase seed and fertilizer and will benefit his family. He dreams of owning his own house. He likes to play sports in his free time.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
El señor Cesar tiene 31 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Maritza Elizabeth con quien tiene una hija 5 años que esta estudiando en preescolar. El señor Cesar trabaja para una tienda de muebles en al aria de gerente desde hace dos años. La señora Maritza Elizabeth se dedica al cuidado y atención de su hija.
A la vivienda le están haciendo falta los acabados del exterior, están solicitando un préstamo ya que no cuentan con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de terminar los acabados.
Con una parte de sueldo que recibe el señor Cesar de su trabajo es para pagar el crédito y que es la única fuente de ingreso que tiene.
texts.en:
