Organiza un grupo y solicita un prestamo que lo utilizará para la compra de insumos para agricultura tales como: fertilizante, semillas, plaguicidas entre otros; espera en el futuro tener abundanetes y buenas cosechas. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la siemra de maíz, frijol y café.
texts.en:
Señor Aurelio is married, 32-years old and completed six years of primary education.  He has four children, and two of them are in school.   Señor Aurelio makes his living in agriculture.  He started his business out of a need to start working and support his family.  At this time, he has fifteen years of experience. 

Señor Aurelio organizes a group and is requesting a loan that he will use to purchase agricultural supplies such as: fertilizers, seeds, insecticide and other items.  In the future, he hopes to have decent and abundant harvests.  The other members of the group make their livings planting corn, beans and coffee.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Oscar Joel

texts.es:
Oscar, es una persona muy reconocida en la comunidad por sus buenas labores, vive actualmente con sus padres y está soltero, no tiene hijos ni cuenta con familiares en el extranjero. El, se dedica a la agricultura, tales como: crianza y comercio de ganado, asimismo al cultivo de granos básicos, dicha actividad la ha realiza desde hace 6 años y lo aprendió de sus padres; existe dificultad por los altos costos del mantenimiento pero también su ventaja porque posee terrenos con pasto propio. 
El crédito que solicita le permitirá comprar concentrado para el ganado y con ello le permitirá aumentar la producción, esta inversión le ayudara a sostener su actividad más rentable. Uno de los riesgos que podría pasar es una posible enfermedad en el ganado.
Su sueño es continuar trabajando para generar más ganancias económicas y en el futuro poder casarse para construir su propia familia. En cuanto a su actividad, crear un negocio más rentable que le ayude a seguir subsistiendo  en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Oscar is a very recognized person in his community for his good work.  He actually lives with his parents and is single.  He does not have children or relatives abroad.  He works in agriculture doing cattle rearing and cultivating basic grains.  He has done this kind of work for 6 years and learned it from his parents.  Difficulty exists due to high maintenance costs but also an advantage because he owns the pasture itself.

The loan he is requesting is to buy concentrate for the cattle and with this, he can increase production.  This investment will help sustain more profitable business.  One of the risks that could happen is a possible disease in cattle.   

His dream is to continue working to generate more income, so that in the future he can marry to start his own family.  In terms of activity, he hopes that profits from his business will enable him to be self-sufficient.

loans.use: to buy concentrate for the cattle.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 31-year-old single man. He lives with his mother in a small village near Jenin City. Mohammad is a construction worker outside Jenin. Because his ability to go to work every day is inhibited by the checkpoint between his city and where he works, his income is unstable and he often faces daily challenges in his effort to make a living.

Mohammad requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy new furniture for his home, so Mohammad and his future wife will live in good living conditions. 

Mohammad appears in the Kiva profile picture.

loans.use: to buy new furniture for his home

loans.name: Olga Clotilde

texts.es:
San Juan de Limay conocido en gran parte por su artesanía y gente trabajadora, fue elegido para el programa de creación de alianzas para el fortalecimiento de las capacidades locales para el saneamiento de Nicaragua. Ahí  Vive  la señora Olga de 55 años de edad, casada, con un núcleo familiar de dos hijos, de profesión agricultora en ganado de leche y novillos de engorde, con otras actividades en venta de lácteos y refrescos.

Actualmente está aplicando para el proyecto de agua y saneamiento adquiriendo  un financiamiento para el mejoramiento de su unidad sanitaria de su vivienda, y necesita comprar su tanque séptico de 750 litros ,cerramiento más gastos de mano de obra, destacando que ella tiene su baño, lavamanos e inodoro y desea terminar su instalación,  ya que conoce la importancia de utilizar un saneamiento mejorado,

Por medio  de esta  alianza, su familia tiene acceso a este proyecto que está beneficiando a varios municipios del país, lo que le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida y contribuir al deterioro del medio ambiente, estos programas vienen ayudar a familias con condiciones económicas más pobre que hacen el uso de letrinas,  el cual causan más enfermedades y contaminan el medio ambiente, es `por ello la necesidad de hacer estos proyectos dirigidos al sector más vulnerable de nuestro país y contribuir a su desarrollo.
texts.en:
San Juan de Limay is largely known for its handicrafts and hard-working people.  It was chosen for the Nicaraguan initiative to expand access to sanitation facilities.  Señora Olga lives there.  She is 55-years old, married and has two children.  She is a farmer who has dairy and beef cattle.  She also sells milk products and carbonated beverages. 

Señora Olga is currently applying to the water and sanitation project.  She needs a loan to improve the bathroom her home.  She needs to purchase her 750 liter septic tank and cap and to pay for labor costs.  She points out that she has her bath, sink and toilet and wants to complete their installation.  She knows the importance of having better sanitation. 

Through the initiative, Señora Olga's family has access to this project, which is benefiting various municipalities in the country.  It will allow her to improve her quality of life and damage to the environment.  These programs help families living in the poorest conditions who use latrines, which cause more illnesses and contaminate the environment.  That is why these projects need to be directed to the most vulnerable sectors of the country and to contribute to their development.

loans.use: to pay for a 750 liter septic tank and cap and labor.

loans.name: Amaal

texts.en:
Amaal is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo while he is working in his grocery store.

Amaal is a 34-year-old married woman. She is the mother of two sons and one daughter. Amaal's husband works in a grocery store he owns that has been opened for five years. It is a profitable business but needs more money to be improved.
 
Amaal took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy grocery products for her husband's store. This will improve his business and his income will be increased.

loans.use: to buy grocery products for her husband's store.

loans.name: Ikhlas

texts.en:
Ikhlas is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo while he was working in his bakery.

Ikhlas is a 21-year-old married woman from Beit Lahia near Jabalia city. Her husband works in a bakery he owns. It has been working for two years. His bakery is very profitable but needs to be improved because he still works with a very old oven and machines.
 
Ikhlas took a loan from FATEN. This loan will help Ikhlas's husband to buy a new dough-making machine and wood for the oven. This will improve his business and make it more profitable.

loans.use: to buy a new dough-making machine and wood for the oven.

loans.name: Natividad De Jesús

texts.es:
Perfil del Cliente 



San Juan de Limay un municipio que pertenece al departamento de Estelí conocido en gran parte por su artesanía y gente trabajadora en la ganadería fue elegido para el programa de creación de alianzas para el fortalecimiento de las capacidades locales para el saneamiento de Nicaragua. Ahí vive el señor natividad  de 36 años de edad, casado. Con un núcleo familiar compuesto por su esposa y tres hijos, de profesión constructor de vivienda.  

Actualmente está aplicando para el proyecto de agua y saneamiento , a través de un financiamiento para el mejoramiento de su unidad sanitaria de su vivienda, ya que no cuenta con las condiciones necesarias y necesita comprar su inodoro económico ,lavamanos, tuberías para conexiones de agua potable y tanque econosan de 750 litros ya que  conoce la importancia de utilizar un saneamiento mejorado 

Por medio  de esta  alianza, su familia tiene acceso a este proyecto que está beneficiando a varios municipios del país, lo que le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida y contribuir al deterioro del medio ambiente, estos programas vienen ayudar a familias con condiciones económicas más pobre que hacen el uso de letrinas,  el cual causan más enfermedades y contaminan el medio ambiente, es `por ello la necesidad de hacer estos proyectos dirigidos al sector más vulnerable de nuestro país y contribuir a su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Client Profile 

San Juan de Limay is a municipality in Estelí Department largely known for its handicrafts and hard-working ranchers.  It was chosen for the Nicaraguan initiative to expand access to sanitation facilities. Señor Natividad lives there.  He is 36-years old, married and his nuclear family is made up of his wife and three children.  Professionally, he is a home builder. 

Señor Natividad is currently applying to the water and sanitation project through a loan to improve the bathroom in his house.  He doesn't have the proper conditions and he needs to purchase a low-cost toilet, a sink, tubing for potable water connections and a 750 liter Econosan.  He knows the importance of improved sanitation.   

Through the initiative, Señor Natividad's family has access to this project, which is benefiting various municipalities in the country. It will allow him to improve his quality of life and damage to the environment. These programs help families living in the poorest conditions who use latrines, which cause more illnesses and contaminate the environment. That is why these projects need to be directed to the most vulnerable sectors of the country and to contribute to their development.

loans.use: to purchase an inexpensive toilet, a sink, potable water connections and a 750 liter Econosan and cap

loans.name: Amy

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of three children, Amy works hard to support her family. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from selling personal products. 

Amy is borrowing PHP 18000 through NWTF in order to buy more stock of rice to sell to her customers.

Amy has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to rent a space at the public market.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice to sell.

loans.name: Shohruy

texts.ru: Шохруй целеустремленный и энергичный молодой человек. Ему 20 лет. Он не женат и живет вместе с родителями и братом. Шохруй учится в Политехническом Университете Таджикистана по специальности строитель-архитектор. Шохруй является одним из успешных студентов. Он своевременно выполняет все домашние задания и помогает своим однокурсникам, если они нуждаются в помощи. Он в свободное время помогает отцу по земледелию. Они выращивают пшеницу и картошку. Шохруй должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет достаточно денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 550 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Shohruy is a goal-oriented and energetic young man. He is 20 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and brother. Shohruy is a student at the Tajikistan Polytechnic University, majoring in architecture. He is a high-achieving student. He completes all his homework in time and helps his fellow students when needed. In his free time, he helps his father grow crops. They grow wheat and potatoes. Shohruy needs to pay his university tuition but his funds are insufficient. He is requesting a loan in the amount of 550 USD to pay for his tuition. He is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for tuition at the university.

loans.name: Sarath's Group

texts.en:
A farmer originally from Samrong district of Takeo province where her resident area is, Sarath is married and has four children. Currently only one of her kids is in school.

To strive for a living and for the sake of her children she grows rice and her husband works as a construction worker. This is the business that she has been involved in since she was 28 years old. 

Including this loan, Sarath is a second-cycled client with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has repaid back her past loan completely and it has enabled her to sustain her living and keep her kid in school. Now she wants to build a decent latrine for her family. Therefore, she forms a group of two to apply for latrine loan. She hopes to own a proper standard latrine to improve hygienic practices in her household.

loans.use: to build a decent latrine for her family.

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es: Ana es una señora muy trabajadora quien vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, por quienes se esfuerza a diario para salir adelante y poder proveerles las necesidades básicas para vivir. Ana se dedica a la venta de huevos y pollos, y su venta la realiza en su casa de habitación. Su esposo trabaja comercializando medicinas naturales, a lo cual se ha dedicado desde hace muchos años por lo que cuenta con clientes fijos. Ana solicita un préstamo a FUSAI para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de láminas y reforzar la estructura de techo con vigas nuevas. La galera actual tiene muchas goteras, acá resguarda a sus pollos y los huevos que vende y donde también almacena otros utensilios del hogar, la mala condición del techo le dificulta realizar su trabajo y quehaceres del hogar. Ella está dispuesta a invertir bien su dinero y solventar esta necesidad que le es de mucha urgencia.
texts.en:
Ana is a very hard-working woman who lives with her husband and children, for whose sake she does her best every day to succeed and provide the basic necessities of life. 

Anna sells eggs and chickens from her home. Her husband works selling natural medicines. He has been doing this work for many years, so he has steady customers. Ana is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that she can have the money she needs to purchase sheet metal roofing and strengthen the roof structure with new beams. 

The present porch area has many leaks, and it is here that she keeps the chickens and eggs she sells and where she also stores other household utensils. The poor condition of the roof makes it difficult for her to carry out her work and household chores. She is ready to invest her money well and pay for this necessity that is very urgent for her.

loans.use: To buy sheet metal roofing for improving her house.

loans.name: Muhoyo

texts.ru: Мухоё способная, энергичная и независимая женщина. Она замужем, ей 30 лет. У нее двое милых детей - одному 7 лет, другому 4 года. Мухоё живет с мужем, детьми, свёкром, свекровью и шурином в районе Спитамен. Ее муж является мастером строителем. Свёкор работает в мелькомбинате. Шурин предоставляет услуги такси. Сама Мухоё на протяжении 4-х лет занимается выращиванием крупно-рогатого скота для продажи. Ей в купле-продаже скота помогают муж и свёкор. Вблизи их дома имеется хорошее пастбище, где Мухоё разводит скот. Кроме этого Мухоё занимается шитьем женских национальных платьев. Сейчас в ее хозяйстве имеются один бык и одна корова с теленком. Мухоё просит кредит для увеличения поголовья скота. На сумму кредита она хочет купить двух коров и корм скота и продвинуть деятельность.
texts.en:
Muhoyo is a capable, energetic, and independent woman. She is married and 30 years old. She has two sweet children one is seven years old, and the other is four years old. Muhoyo lives with her husband, children, father and brother-in-law, in the Spitamenes region of Tajikistan. Her husband works as a master builder. Her father-in-law works in a mill. Her brother-in-law provides a taxi service. Muhoyo, herself, has been engaged in raising cattle for sale. She raises and sells cattle to help her husband and father-in-law. Near their home there is a good pasture where Muhoyo raises the cattle. 
In addition Muhoyo is engaged in the sewing their national dress. Currently her household has on bull and one cow with a calf. With the loan she hopes to buy two cows and cattle feed to fatten the cattle.

loans.use: Two buy two head of cattle and feed.

loans.name: Cesar Alfonso

texts.es: El señor Cesar tiene cuarenta y nueve (49) años de edad, vive en el municipio de San Jacinto, departamento de Bolivar; este municipio es considerado como el primer centro artesanal de la costa Atlántica de Colombia, además también el primer comercializador de productos elaborados en telar vertical como hamacas y su diversificación, también produce productos elaborados en croché y macramé, así como también productos de la madera, la talabartería y los instrumentos de gaita entre otros. Cesar tiene dos (2) hijos en edades de dieciséis (16) y diecinueve (19) años de edad, solo vive con uno de ellos. Su actividad de negocio son las artesanías de hamacas; actividad que aprendió trabajando como empleado inicialmente, luego por la necesidad de generar mas ingresos, decide independizarse. Este es su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual lo aplicará en la compra de materiales para elaborar hamacas, ya que tiene pedidos que no puede atender por la falta de un mayor capital. Tiene como meta a futuro, adecuar un local comercial en su casa, donde pueda ofrecer sus productos y los materiales para la elaboración de estos productos. Algunos de sus indicadores financieros son: Capital de trabajo $1.000.000, Rentabilidad sobre ventas 18%, Endeudamiento futuro 51%.
texts.en: Cesar is 49 years old and lives in the municipality of San Jacinto, department of Bolivar. This place is known as the first craft center on Colombia's Atlantic coast as well as the first place to sell handmade products made on vertical looms, like hammocks and other items. The city also produces works of croché and macramé, as well as woodwork, leather goods, flutes and other items. Cesar has two children, ages 16 and 19, only one of which lives with him. He makes a living making hammocks. He learned the trade working as an employee, and then decided to go out on his own to earn more income. This is his first Kiva loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and he plans to use it to purchase materials to make hammocks, since he has orders that he cannot fulfill because of a lack of capital. His goal for the future is to set up a commercial space in his home where he can offer his products and the materials needed to make them. Some of his financial statistics include: $1,000 of working capital, 18 percent return on sales and a debt ratio of 51 percent.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make hammocks.

loans.name: Alma Consuelo

texts.es: Alma es madre de  cinco hijos de los cuales los dos de mayor edad trabajan como camioneros (motorista de camiones al igual que su padre). Alma es ama de casa dedicada a comercializar pollos y huevos, con lo que puede brindar ayuda para solventar los gastos del hogar, así mismo cuida a sus tres pequeños hijos. Alma y su familia cuentan con una pequeña casa hecha de lámina, muy vulnerable a las inclemencias del tiempo, como la lluvia y el viento, por lo que es necesario realizar algunos refuerzos urgentes. Ella solicita un préstamo con el cual pueda comprar: láminas, madera, clavos, entre otros más con lo que no sólo pueda reparar el techo, sino también las paredes que están hechas de lámina y madera. Hace 25 años que vive en esta humilde casa y hace mucho fue la última vez que Alma y su esposo pudieron realizar arreglos a su vivienda. La visita de FUSAI a su comunidad le despertó su interés de prestar el dinero para realizar las mejoras de su casa; convencida que con esto resguardará mejor a su familia de la lluvia, el sol y el viento.
texts.en:
Alma is a mother of five children, of whom the oldest two work as truck drivers, like their father. Alma is a housewife who sells chickens and eggs which helps to pay for household expenses and support her three young children. 

Alma and her family have a small house made of sheet metal which is susceptible to bad weather such as rain and wind, and is badly in need of reinforcement. She is requesting a loan with which she can buy sheet metal, wood, nails, and other materials that will allow her not only to repair the roof, but also the walls, which are made of metal and wood.  

She has lived in this house for 25 years and it has been a long time since she and her husband have been able to make repairs to the home. FUSAI's visit to her community ignited her interest in borrowing money to make improvements to her house. She believes that this would better protect her family from the rain, sun, and wind.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Mileydis

texts.es: La señora Mileydis tiene veintiséis (26) años de edad, reside en el municipio de San Jacinto, departamento de Bolivar; este municipio es considerado como el primer centro artesanal de la costa Atlántica de Colombia, además también el primer comercializador de productos elaborados en telar vertical como hamacas y su diversificación, también produce productos elaborados en croché y macramé, así como también productos de la madera, la talabartería y los instrumentos de gaita entre otros. Mileydis es madre soltera, tiene un (1) hijo de dos (2) años de edad. Su actividad de negocio consiste en la venta de productos para tiendas y productos de artesanías que ella elabora. Aprendió a tejer mochilas con las vecinas y también con el SENA (Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje) realizó un curso en tejeduría vertical y horizontal. Este es su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, el cual lo aplicará en la compra de viveres para tienda y materiales para la elaboración de mochilas. Su sueño a futuro es tener una tienda grande y un almacen de artesanías, ya que uno de sus desafíos es sacar adelante a su hijo.
texts.en: Mileydis is 26 years old and lives in the municipality of San Jacinto, department of Bolivar. This place is known as the first craft center on Colombia's Atlantic Coast, as well as the first place to sell handmade products made on vertical looms like hammocks and other items. It also produces crochet and macramé items, as well as woodwork, leather goods, flutes and other items. Mileydis is a single mother with a 2-year-old son. She makes a living selling general products and crafts she makes herself. She learned to weave backpacks from her neighbors and also from SENA (National Apprenticeship Service), taking a course on vertical and horizontal weaving. This is her first Kiva loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, and she plans to use it to purchase groceries for her store as well as materials to make backpacks. Her dream for the future is to have a big store and a warehouse of crafts, since one of her challenges is to keep making headway for her son.

loans.use: to purchase groceries and materials to make backpacks.

loans.name: María Luz

texts.es: María de 54 años de edad es madre soltera de una niña de 16 y un niño de 17 años de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar, ella trabaja muy duro como agricultora y así mismo comercializa productos de belleza por catálogo, con lo que puede salir adelante brindándoles lo necesario a sus hijos. Debido a que ella sola se dedica a cuidar y sustentar a sus hijos, María da prioridades a la alimentación, vestimenta y estudios de sus hijos, situación por la que su casa se ha ido deteriorando poco a poco. María desea reparar una habitación de su casa en donde duermen sus pequeños, es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de: láminas, cemento, polines, arena y otros materiales de construcción para realizar las reparaciones necesarias a la habitación. Esto será de gran ayuda para ella, puesto que gracias a dicho préstamo les brindará un hogar cómodo y seguro a sus hijos.
texts.en: Maria, 54, is a single mother of a 16 year old girl and a 17 year old boy who are both in school. She works very hard as a farmer, and also sells beauty products from a catalog, so that she can get ahead and give her kids what they need. Due to the fact that she is the only one caring for and sustaining her children, Maria prioritizes food, clothing and her children's education, which has meant that her house has been deteriorating little by little. She wants to repair one of the rooms in her house where her kids sleep, which is why she has asked for a loan to buy tin sheeting, cement, wood pallets, sand, and other construction materials to make the necessary repairs. This will be a great help to her, since thanks to this loan she will be able to give her children a safe and comfortable home.

loans.use: to buy tin sheeting, cement and sand to repair her home.

loans.name: María Olimpia

texts.es:
Perfil del Cliente 




	San Juan de Limay conocido en gran parte por su artesanía y gente trabajadora en la ganadería, este municipio fue elegido para el programa de creación de alianzas para el fortalecimiento de las capacidades locales para el saneamiento de Nicaragua. Ahí  Vive  la señora María de 46 años de edad, casada con un núcleo familiar de dos hijos, su profesión es ser comerciante de lácteos y agricultora ya que posee una finca con ganado de leche y engorde de novillos. 

Actualmente está aplicando para el proyecto de agua y saneamiento , a través de un financiamiento para el mejoramiento de su unidad sanitaria de su vivienda, ya que no cuenta con las condiciones necesarias y necesita comprar su inodoro económico ,lavamanos, cerramientos  , biodigestor de 750 litros más gastos de mano de obra, ya que conocen la importancia de utilizar un saneamiento mejorado 

Por medio  de esta  alianza, su familia tiene acceso a este proyecto que está beneficiando a varios municipios del país, lo que le permitirá mejorar su nivel de vida y contribuir al deterioro del medio ambiente, estos programas vienen ayudar a familias con condiciones económicas más pobre que hacen el uso de letrinas,  el cual causan más enfermedades y contaminan el medio ambiente, es `por ello la necesidad de hacer estos proyectos dirigidos al sector más vulnerable de nuestro país.
texts.en: San Juan de Limay is known in large part for its crafts and the hardworking people who make a living in livestock. This town was chosen to take part in a program to strengthen the local sanitation abilities in Nicaragua. Here lives Maria, a 46-year-old married mother of two children. She makes a living selling dairy and other farm products, since she has a farm with milk cows and young steers. She is applying for the water and sanitation project, through which she will use the loan to improve the bathroom in her home, since it lacks ideal conditions. She needs to purchase a toilet, sink, water connections and a garbage disposal, as well as pay for labor, because she knows the importance of improving her home's sanitation. Through this program, her family has access to a project benefiting a number of towns in the country, allowing people to improve their quality of life and protect the environment. These programs are helping families who live in very poor conditions and use latrines, which cause sickness and contaminate the surrounding area. That is why these projects are needed in the most vulnerable areas of the country.

loans.use: to purchase a toilet, sink, water connections, a garbage disposal and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Ma. Luisa

texts.en:
Ma. Luisa is 42 years old and married with three children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF in order to purchase feed, medicine and vaccines for her pigs.

Ma. Luisa has been raising pigs for 13 years and also earns additional income from rice retailing.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed, medicine and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Kety

texts.es: Ketty, a sus 19 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja y aún no tiene hijos. Por falta de experiencia laboral y oportunidades, le ha sido  difícil emplearse, por esa razón decidió buscar opciones para progresar por sí misma y montó una pequeña papelería hace 3 años, inició con un ahorro familiar y su jornada laboral comienza desde muy temprano en la mañana, para aprovechar los horarios escolares, que le permiten atraer más clientes. Ketty es una joven enérgica, trabajadora y con su visión emprendedora siempre está buscando opciones que le permitan salir adelante, por esa razón solicita el apoyo del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de surtido (resmas de papel, lapiceros, marcadores, cinta adhesiva, témperas, entre otros) con el fin de darle continuidad a sus negocio y tener disponibilidad de productos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes de manera oportuna, esto le permitirá a Ketty avanzar para cumplir su principal objetivo que es hacer crecer su negocio y posicionarlo para que sea más rentable y le dé la oportunidad de tener una estabilidad económica y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: At 19, Ketty lives with her common law partner and has no children.  Due to lack of work experience and opportunities, it has been hard for her to find a job, reason why she decided to find other options to progress on her own and she opened a small school and office supplies store three years ago, she started with some family savings, her work starts very early in the morning, to take advantage of school schedules, which allow her to attract more customers.  Ketty is energetic, hardworking and with her entrepreneurial vision she is always looking for options that allow her to get ahead, this is why she requests a loan to invest in buying merchandise (paper, pens, markers, adhesive tape, paint and other products) with the purpose of continuing with her business and having stock available to fulfill the needs of her customers in a timely manner, this will allow Ketty to move forward to achieve her main goal which is to grow her business and make it more profitable so that it gives her economic stability and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy paper, pens, markers, tape, paint and other products.

loans.name: Kun's Group

texts.en: Originally from Samrong district of Takeo province, Kun is a parent blessed with five children, one of whom is still in school. Kun makes a living via rice farming whilst her husband works at a construction site. This is the business that she has had for 25 years. Kun is a fourth-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has managed her past loan wisely to support her business and make a decent income to renovate her house and keep her kid in school. Now, in a group of three, she is the leader. She will spend her loan portion to construct a proper latrine for her family. She hopes to own a proper latrine for her family.

loans.use: To construct a proper latrine for her family

loans.name: Evelyn Scarlet

texts.es: Evelyn Scarlet mayor de edad soltera con dos  hijo menores  de edad de unos de los municipios de Chinandega zona ubicada en el occidente del país. Evelyn es una microempresaria la cual posee varias actividades ubicadas en su casa de habitación como: venta de mercadería en general, venta de gaseosas y golosinas también da el servicio de juegos de nintendos, sus compras las realiza en mercados de mayoreos otras las realiza fuera del país sus ventas son al contado y al crédito y su servicio de nintendo son al contado, posee clientes fijos y eventuales ella desde muy temprano comienza su labor de trabajo brindándoles excelentes servicios a  sus clientes, Evelyn se caracteriza por ser una mujer con grandes deseos de superación para sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo, uno de sus sueños es de ver formados profesionalmente a sus dos hijos y ver terminada su casa de habitación para así brindarles un techo digno donde vivir, el objetivo de este crédito es para compra de activo fijo ya que ella necesita actualizar los equipos y comprar dos consolas Xbox de 360 así también televisores y surtir su inventario de mercadería en general, Evelyn agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas Kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.-
texts.en: Evelyn Scarlet is a single mother of two young children and lives in the Chinandega area in the western part of Nicaragua. She runs small businesses out of her home, selling general supplies, soft drinks and snacks and offering video-game services. She makes her purchases at wholesale markets or outside of the country, and her sales are on cash and credit, while the video-game service is with cash down. She has regular and occasional customers. Evelyn starts working very early, providing excellent services to her customers. She is known as a woman with big dreams to move up in life and make headway for her children. Some of her dreams are to see her children become professionals and to finish construction of her home so she can give them a dignified place to live. She plans to use the loan to purchase two Xbox 360s as well as televisions and to stock up on general supplies for her store. Evelyn is very grateful for the support Kiva investors provide to people with limited resources.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for her business.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en: Merlyn runs a general retail store in the village of Panduma, Tukuran where she lives with her family. She also buys charcoal and sells it in the market. Her husband works as an OFW (Overseas Filipino Worker) and of the money she receives, she uses a portion of it for her business. She has been doing this for more than five years to make a living. Recently, she borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC in order to buy more charcoal and grocery items to sell. She hopes that in the future, she would be able to have business expansion and provide her family a better living condition.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal and grocery items to sell

loans.name: Ligaya

texts.en:
Ligaya is 45 years old. She is from Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. She is married and has six children. Ligaya manages a gardening business for a living. She helps her husband manage their own farm of rice for it is the main source of income of the family. 

In 2011, Ligaya joined GDMPC. Recently, she has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase farm fertilizers. Ligaya hopes to increase farm production now and in subsequent cycles of production in order to gain more income.

loans.use: to purchase farm fertilizers

loans.name: Chea's Group

texts.en:
Age 47 and a villager from Takeo province’s Samrong district, Chea is a widowed mother of five children. She depends solely on her rice cultivation business, which she has occupied for ages and has earned her about 23,000 KHR per day. 

Chea has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before. She now leads a group of three to take out a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to build a proper latrine for her family. She expects to own a decent latrine to improve sanitation for her family.

loans.use: To build a proper latrine for family

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 31 years old and married with one child who is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Grace has a business selling seafood in the Philippines. Grace requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more seafood to sell to customers.

Grace has been in this business for three years. In the future, Grace would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Ann Maa Dakhineswari Self Help Group

texts.en:
Ann Maa Dakhineswari Self Help Group is an exemplary group. They all are engaged in different activities to earn their livelihood. Some of them are engaged in agricultural activities, some are running a grocery shop, some sell vegetables, and some have a wood business.

One person who deserves to be highlighted is Basanti, a 40-year-old married woman with three children, who is engaged in cultivating vegetables and selling them in the market. Through her job, she works to support her family, to improve her business and to continue growing. She is a very determined person who wants to continue growing. She is seeking part of this loan in order to be able to invest it in the purchase of vegetables seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, and other vegetables and fruits to continue to increase her sales.

The group is very grateful for this opportunity for growth that it is receiving.

loans.use: to pay for purchasing vegetable seeds, fertilizers, pesticides etc.

loans.name: Soeurt's Group

texts.en:
Soeurt is 53 years old and a citizen from Sangke district of Battambang province, Cambodia. She is married and has seven children. Nowadays, she needs to take care of only two kids as they are in school. For her family, rice farming is the core income generating business which she has engaged in for 20 years, and has returned her about 13,800 KHR per day. 

Soeurt is new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She now forms a group of two to apply for a new loan. She is applying for 600,000 KHR whereas her co-borrower is seeking for 800,000 KHR. 

As the leader, she will use her loan portion to buy potash, rice seed, and to pay for the ploughing fee. She strongly believes that she can make a good income and improve her lifestyle to better than before.

loans.use: To buy potash, rice seed, and to pay for the ploughing fee

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
Ammar is a 31-year-old married man. He is a father with three children: two sons and one daughter. For the past 12 years, Ammar has been working in a workshop for electrical appliance repair, especially refrigerators. It is a profitable business and he has a good experience in this field, which makes him a well-known person in his city.
 
Ammar took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more repair parts for his workshop, which will improve his business and make it more profitable. 

Ammar appears in the photo in his workshop.

loans.use: to buy more repair parts for his workshop

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy ingredients for making fish feed to sell

loans.name: Tahrir

texts.en:
Tahrir is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo besides his taxi. Tahrir is a 25-year-old married woman. She is a mother with three children: two sons and one daughter. Her husband is an employee in the public sector and gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family's needs so Tahrir's husband would like to work as a taxi driver after work so he can provide decent living conditions for his family.

Tahrir took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her husband to pay the costs of purchasing a new taxi. This will provide them with a higher income and better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a new taxi

loans.name: Soeurm's Group

texts.en:
Soeurm, 54, is a mother of six children, two of whom are in school. She is a widow who strives for a living as a single mother through her chicken raising business. She has been involved in current business for three years.

Soeurm has never been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) before. She is now in a group of three to apply for a new loan of 500,000 KHR each. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy more chicken to raise for resale. 

She hopes that she can make more income from her business so as she can keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy more chicken to raise for resale

loans.name: Hoeurm's Group

texts.en: A villager from Sangke district of Battambang, Hoeurm is a 38-year-old father of two schoolchildren. His main income source to feed his entire family is from rice cropping. This is not the first loan for Hoeurm with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). After the previous successful loan, which he has fully repaid, he can now earn a decent income to provide daily decent food for his kids. For this new loan, he is the leader of a group consisting of three borrowers. As the leader, he will spend his loan portion to buy fertilizer and rice seed for his farmland. He hopes that he can grow his crop timely and double his income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and rice seed for his farm

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is 34 years old and married with two children, both of whom are in school. Marissa works very hard to provide for them.

Marissa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

Marissa has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Marissa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Asiya

texts.en:
Asiya is a 37-year-old married woman and a mother of six. For about three years she is been working in hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are in great demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested for a loan of Rs. 30,000 to buy reels of threads in different colors, along with the packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment. In this way she would be able to complete the orders of her customers on time.

Asiya expects boost in her earnings and dreams for her children's bright future.

loans.use: to buy reels of threads in different colors, packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Nazia is a 34-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a business of flower making for the last two years. She offers various colorful flowers for decorating homes and events like birthdays, parties, etc. She sells them to the people of her community and also in the local market. 

She has good communication skills and has a good client list. She is motivated to provide for her family. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy stock of shiny papers and glace papers with the packs of ribbons, floral tapes and wires. In this way she would be able to meet with the increasing demands of her customers consistently. 

She wishes to spend part of the revenue to deal with the expenses of her family and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of shiny papers and glace papers with the packs of ribbons, floral tapes and wires.

loans.name: Sary's Group

texts.en: Sary, 51, and a citizen from Samrong district of Takeo province, is the parent of five children. To deal with the daily cost of living, she grows paddy rice and raises pigs as the main business. To assist her in earning more income, her husband works as a paid worker at a construction site. She has been involved in the current business for 20 years. Sary is not new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has been with VisionFund for five previous cycles and has repaid back the loan, which has enabled her to sustain her business with success. She now leads a group of three to apply for a new loan to build a decent latrine. She hopes this purchase will enable her to construct a decent latrine on time for the sake of hygienic practice for her entire household.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine

loans.name: Phoem's Group

texts.en: Phoem is 40 years old and an inhabitant of Samrong district of Takeo province. She has six children, four of whom are in school with the remaining two too young for schooling. To tackle the daily cost of living, she grows rice while her husband drives a motor-taxi to supplement her income. She has been involved in her current business for 20 years, earning about 19,000 KHR per day. This is the first microloan for Phoem with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is now in a group consisting of two female members to seek a latrine loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to build a decent latrine for her kids for the sake of hygienic practice.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine for her kids

loans.name: Khley's Group

texts.en: Khley, in his late 40s and a resident of Takeo province’s Samrong district, is married and has three children. He deals with his primary basic needs via working as a paid worker at a construction site and his wife is working at a factory. He has engaged in his current business for ages and he manages to earn about 13,000 KHR per day. Khley is new to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). Now, he leads a group of four to apply for a new loan. As the leader, he will spend his loan portion to build a decent latrine for his family. He hopes to own a proper latrine to prevent illness due to lacking sanitation practices.

loans.use: To build a decent latrine for his family

loans.name: Jahara Mahila Self Help Group

texts.en:
These members belong to the Jahara Mahila Self Help Group. One of them is Jahara, age 39. She has a spouse and three children. She alternates her daily activities with a business selling rice, grams, spices, wafers, hair oil and other household consumables. She runs a small shop to support her family where she sells all these things. She has been in this business for a good amount of time and she does well thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business. She also sells vegetables in her shop.

She requests the loan to buy sugar, rice, edible oil, soap, detergents and other household consumables for her business. She thanks those who share her dream by this means and commits to make her payments as scheduled. The businesses of the other group members are butcher shop, dairy farm, and a tailoring shop.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, edible oil, soap, detergents and other household consumables to sell

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Sakina, age 40, deals in an animal sales business. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, raises them and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income.  She is a dedicated mother of seven. She needs to improve her business to meet the needs of her children. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs 30,000 to purchase two more goats. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level. She has shown good repayment behavior during her eight years of loan history.

loans.use: to purchase two more goats.

loans.name: Sabas

texts.es:
Sabas, decide optar por un nuevo préstamo porque el anterior le ayudo a obtener una cosecha más abundante; esta inversión le permitirá comprar materiales agrícolas, entre estos: 6 quintales de abono, insecticidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, esto le servirá para una manzana de tierra que tiene sembrada. 
El efecto del crédito anterior fue favorable, ya que la cosecha que obtuvo le ayudo para comercializarla. El grupo familiar se mantiene el mismo, con la diferencia que hoy en día cuenta con mayor oportunidad para prepararse académicamente su familia, gracias a los ingresos económicos que generan los financiamientos.
texts.en:
Sabas has decided to request a new loan because the previous one helped him reap a more abundant harvest.  This investment will allow him to buy farm supplies, including 600 lbs. of fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides which he will use on the plot of land he has planted.

The effect of the previous loan was favorable because the harvest he obtainted helped him sell his crops.  The family group remains the same except for the fact that now his family has more opportunities to get an education thanks to the income the loans have generated.

loans.use: To buy 600 lbs. of fertilizer, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Víctor Vicente

texts.es: El cliente es de la ciudad de Machala.  El negocio pertenecía originalmente a su madre, pero por motivos de salud, se lo cedió posteriormente a él.  Sale temprano en la mañana para abastecerse de productos para la tienda y luego se dedica a vender todo el día, a partir de las 8:30 am.  Es soltero y no tiene hijos.  Desea invertir el dinero del préstamo en mercadería para su negocio: víveres, productos, útiles escolares y bisutería.
texts.en:
This borrower is from the city of Machala. The business originally belonged to his mother, but because of health reasons, she decided to pass it on to him.

The borrower leaves early in the morning so that he can restock his store with products. He then spends the rest of the day making sales, beginning at 8:30 A.M. The borrower is single and has no children. He wants to invest the money from his loan in merchandise for his business such as food products, school supplies, and trinkets.

loans.use: to buy food products, school supplies, and trinkets to sell in his store.

loans.name: Noemi Ruth

texts.es:
Noemi tiene 39 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor y sobre todo tiene paisajes maravillosos y una gastronomía variada. Noemi es una joven que ha atravesado por muchas adversidades, pero ello ha hecho que Noemi luche cada día por salir adelante, sobre todo porque es madre de 2 hijos de 18 y 12 años a los cuales quiere mucho y sobre todo porque son lo mas importante que tiene en la vida y por ello daría la vida para poder ofrecerles una vida digna;  mas aun que están estudiando en el nivel superior y secundario.

Con mucho esfuerzo Noemí estudio una carrera técnica de cosmetología, y gracias a ello y luego de mucho ahorro logro iniciar su pequeño negocio de salón de belleza, negocio con el cual saca adelante a su familia y con el que sale  adelante cada  día, gracias a su esfuerzo y lucha.

Noemi está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá construir un baño para su vivienda con lo cual mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia ya que actualmente no cuenta con un baño en su vivienda, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos y poder tener un salón de belleza”.
texts.en:
Noemí, 39, lives int he city of Pucallpa which is known for its warm, welcoming climate, its marvelous countryside and varied gastronomy.  Noemí is a young woman who has lived through much adversity; but this has made her struggle every day to get ahead.  Especially since she is the mother of two children, ages 18 and 12, who she loves very much as they are what's most important to her.  She would give her life to offer them a decent lifestyle.  They are in high school and junior high.

Through much effort Noemí received a technical degree in cosmetology.  Thanks to her degree and hard work saving, she began a small beauty salon.  Through the business she is able to support her family with much effort and hard work.

Noemí is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help she has received she will be able to build a bathroom.  This will improve her family's quality of life because currently there is no bathroom in the house.  This will encourage her to continue striving toward her goal:  "To give her children a profession and to have a beauty salon".

loans.use: To build a bathroom.

loans.name: Manuela Ramos Group

texts.es: Marcelina de 59 años es casada con 05 hijos la cual sigue apoyando a 02 de ellos. Ella pertenece al grupo “Manuela Ramos” conformada por 07 mujeres emprendedoras, cada una de ellas con distintas actividades comerciales. Al ver que los ingresos de la casa no eran suficientes Marcelina decide emprender su propio negocio, pues actualmente ofrece verduras en un mercado de su localidad. Con el fruto de su esfuerzo ha mejorado su vivienda  y hacerse acreedora de un stand la cual lo alquila.  Tiene como meta sacar adelante a sus hijos en su educación. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de verduras como papas, zanahorias, alverjas, entre otros. El grupo  “Manuela Ramos” agradecen a las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Marcelina se encuentra sentada, es la primera del lado izquierda viste chompa color amarillo y chaleco marón. Karina no pudo estar presente por motivo de trabajo.
texts.en:
Marcelina, 59, is married and has five children, two of which are still in her care.  She belongs to the communal bank "Manuela Ramos" which is comprised of seven women entrepreneurs who each has a different business activity.  

When she began noticing that the household income was not enough, Marcelina decided to set up her own business selling vegetables at the town market. Through her hard work she has made improvements at home and bought a stand that she rents out.  Her goal is to give her children an education.  

She has requested a loan to buy vegetables such as potatoes, carrots, peas, and others.  The "Manuela Ramos" group is grateful to the lenders who made this loan possible.  Marcelina is seated, first from the left in a yellow sweater and brown vest.  Karina was unable to be present for the photograph because of work.

loans.use: To buy vegetables.

loans.name: Iskra Tamara

texts.es: Iskra Tamara de 27 años de edad casada y con tres hijos menores de edad a su cargo reside en el departamento de Chinandega su actividad económica es la venta de frescos, comida rápida y ropa por encargos las compras las realiza en los mercados aledaños a su domicilio al contado,ella se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer responsable,con ganas de superación y emprendedora que lucha día a día para llevar el sustento a su hogar, el objetivo de este crédito es para capital de trabajo,para la compra de productos de consumo para la elaboración de comida y frescos. como : arroz, frijoles,carne, verduras, pollo, entre otros, desde hace más de 4 años se dedica a ejercer este negocio, su mayor sueño es poder mejorar su vivienda. Iskra agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos economicos
texts.en:
Iskra Tamara, 27, is married and has three underage children under her care. She lives in the Chinandega department and works selling beverages, fast food and clothes that her customers order. She buys her supplies in nearby marketplaces, and pays for them in cash. Iskra Tamara is known to be a responsible and enterprising woman, always looking to improve, who fights every day to bring food to the table.

With this loan, she will buy supplies to prepare her foods and beverages, such as rice, beans, meat, vegetables and chicken. She has had this business for over four years. Her biggest dream is to make some home improvements. Iskra greatly appreciates the support that Kiva investors offer people with little economic resources.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as rice, oil, firewood, beans and meat.

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca,  tiene 28 años de edad, disfruta de dos hijos, uno de ellos está estudiando y el otro tiene tres años de edad. Ella, se dedica a la elaboración, venta de pupusas y tostadas, dicha actividad la aprendió con una tía y lo desempeña desde hace tres años, lo realiza solo los días martes y sábados.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar materia prima, tales como: harina de arroz, maíz, frijoles, gas, entre otros; esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar sus inventarios y obtener mayores ingresos.
Su sueño es fortalecer su negocio y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca, 28, enjoys spending time with her two chidlren, one of whom is in school and the other is three years old.  She earns a living making and selling pupusas (stuffed tortillas) and sandwiches.  She learned the trade from her aunt and has been in business for three years, working Tuesdays and Saturdays.

The loan will allow her to buy supplies such as rice flour, corn, beans, gas, etc.  This investment will help increase her inventory so she can earn more income.

Her goal is to strengthen her business and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy rice flour, corn, beans, gas and other items.

loans.name: Jose Del Carmen

texts.es:
José, requiere de un nuevo préstamo porque necesita de mas capital de trabajo para el taller de estructuras metálicas; esta  inversión le ayudara a comprar diversidad de material  y un soldador. 
El crédito anterior fue de mucha ayuda, por lo que permitió incrementar su maquinaria y de esta manera obtuvo mayores ingresos; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares se han mejorado.
texts.en:
José requires a new loan because he needs more work capital for his metal shop.  This investment will help him buy diverse material and a welding machine.

The previous loan was very helpful and allowed him to increase his machinery and earn more income.   His economic conditions and the family's circumstances have improved.

loans.use: To buy diverse material and a welding machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional amounts of thread, thus helping him sell more Kente cloth due to having an increased inventory capacity.

loans.name: Mansurjon

texts.ru: Мансурджон с детства мечтал получить высшее образование. Он успешно учился в средней школе, но после окончания средней школы у него не было возможности поступить в университет и продолжить учебу. Мансурджон начал работать и помогать родителям. После того как он женился, ему было необходимо зарабатывать больше денег. Итак, он начал свой бизнес предоставлением услуги такси. Он более 4 лет занимается этим бизнесом. Мансурджон перевозит пассажиров с одного района на другое. Он постепенно развевает свой бизнес. Мансурджон данное время является основным кормильцем, так как его жена домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием их ребенка. Мансурджон обратился за займом целью того, чтобы отремонтировать свою машину. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 4900 сомони. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Ever since he was a child, Mansurjon has dreamed of receiving a higher education.  He did well in high school, but after graduation he didn't get a chance to go to university and continue his studies.  He began to work and help his parents.  After Mansurjon married, he needed to start earning more money, so he started his own taxi business.  He has been involved in this business for more than four years.  He takes passengers from one region to the other.  He is increasing his business little by little.  At the moment, Mansurjon is the primary breadwinner in his family, since his wife is a homemaker and is raising their children.  He has asked for a loan so he can make repairs to his car.  He has asked for the sum of 4,900 somoni.  He is awaiting your kindness and is counting on your charity.

loans.use: To repair his car

loans.name: Faustine

texts.en:
Faustine is a small scale seller of Red-Red (a traditional Ghanaian staple food that is largely made from spiced cow-peas, ripped plantains and palm oil) in Ve-Deme (near Hohoe). She has had some degree of formal education as she is a middle-school graduate. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a farmer. 

Faustine has been preparing and selling Red-Red for nearly 10 years. Her income is used to help her husband pay the utility bills and their children’s school fees. She plans on using her loan to purchase an increased quantity of Red-Red ingredients, thus allowing her to meet rising customers’ demands. She hopes to use the profits from her enterprise to fulfill her dream of mounting a Red-Red stand, hence helping her sell from a fixed location in the future.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of Red-Red food ingredients, thus allowing her to meet rising customers’ demands.

loans.name: Patricia Elena

texts.es: Gracias por apoyar a Patricia, quien con su credikiva pudo comprar ropa, perfumes, cosméticos, accesorios como aretes, collares, e insumos de belleza. Con esta inversión incrementó su surtido, las ventas, y las utilidades del negocio; trayendo mejoras para la familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo crédito para seguir invirtiendo en sus productos, los cuales obedecen a pedidos de sus clientes, puesto que se acerca una temporada de buena demanda. Patricia dice a sus financiadores: “Muchos agradecimientos a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y a KIVA, sigan apoyándome”
texts.en: Thank you for supporting Patricia, who, thanks to the previous loan, was able to buy clothes, perfumes, cosmetics, accessories such as earrings or necklaces, and beauty products. Thanks to this investment, she now offers a wider range of products, and has seen an increase in sales and profits. This means a better life for her family. Patricia now asks for a new loan to keep buying more merchandise to sell, in order to fulfill requests for customers, and because she nows that the coming season always brings with it an increase in demand. A small message from Patricia: "Thank you very much to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and to Kiva, I hope you'll continue to support me."

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Gul Naz

texts.en:
Gul Naz is a 37-year-old married woman. She successfully runs a small general store in her community. She offers various goods for daily use. She has good communication skills and counts on a good client list. Her husband is a driver and earns insufficient income to support his family alone. She is a mother of five children and is motivated to provide for her family. 

As Gul Naz wants to grow her business, she has requested a loan of PKR 35,000 to buy stock of rice, flour and grains with some packs of cleaning products such as soaps and shampoos. She then would be able to cater to more customers. She is in her sixth loan cycle and has shown excellent repayment behavior. She wishes to utilize part of the profits to pay for personal expenses and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy stock of rice, flour and grains with some packs of cleaning products such as soaps and shampoos.

loans.name: Mirolim

texts.ru: Миролим молодой и перспективный человек. Ему 23 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети еще маленькие и его жена занимается воспитанием детей и поэтому нигде не работает. Миролим более 5 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Так как он живет в сельской местности, ему очень удобно развевать свой бизнес земледелием. Он в основном выращивает арбуз на 0.50 га земли, кукуруза на 0.40 га земли. Он уже имеет достаточно опыта для того, чтобы развевать свой бизнес. Миролим как основной кормилец семьи должен развевать бизнес дальше и получать больше дохода. Для этого ему необходимо получать хороший урожай. Для того, чтобы он получал хороший урожай он должен дать удобрение своей земле. Он данное время не имеет денег для покупки минерального удобрения. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 сомони для покупки минерального удобрения. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mirolim is a promising young man.  He is 23 years old and he is married with two children at home.  The children are still small and his wife takes care of them because there is nowhere for her to work.  For more than five years, Mirolim has been running his own business.  Since he lives in a village, is it very convenient for him to get into the agricultural work.  He mainly grows watermelon on .5 hectares of land and maize on .4 hectares.  He already has enough experience to increase his business.  Since he is the primary breadwinner in his family, Mirolim needs to increase his business to receive a higher income.  In order for this to happen, he needs to receive a good crop, and in order to receive a good crop he needs to fertilize his land.  At the moment, he doesn't have enough money to buy mineral fertilizer, so he is asking for a loan of 1,000 somoni to buy the fertilizer.  He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer for a plot where he grows watermelon and maize

loans.name: Arbobhudoyor

texts.ru:
Арбобхудоёру 50 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Его жена Гулоим добрая и трудолюбивая женщина и всегда поддерживает своего мужа во всём. Арбобхудоёр более 5 лет занимается скотоводством. Он данное время в активе имеет 2 коровы. Арбобхудоёр имеет не большой доход и ели-ели справляется с семейными расходами. Он долго думал организовать новый бизнес, купле продажей индустриальных товаров, однако так как он живет в сельской местности ему удобно развевать бизнес скотоводством, чем другие виды бизнеса. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту. 
Этот займ поможет ему полнить оборотный капитал и таким путем увеличить доход. От полученного дохода, он планирует обеспечить своих детей высококачественными продуктами питания и хорошим образованием.
texts.en: Arbobhudoyor is 50 years old and he is married with two children at home.  His wife, Guloim, is a kind and hard-working woman and she always supports her husband in everything he does.  For more than five years, Arbobhudoyor has been involved in raising animals.  At the moment, he has two cows to his name.  He doesn't have any other income and he barely earns enough to provide for his family.  He gave much thought to starting a new business in buying and selling industrial goods, but since he lives in a village it would make more sense for him to increase his livestock business than to go down another business route.  He is asking for a loan of 5,000 somoni to buy cows.  He is awaiting your kindness.  This loan will help Arbobhudoyor increase his working capital and in turn increase his income.  He plans to use the money from this loan to buy his children some quality food to eat and to pay for their education.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase his working capital

loans.name: Chavarsho

texts.ru: Чаваршо 61 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Одного сына и одну дочь. Чаваршо имеет высшее образование филолога. Он работает в центре обеспечения методологии при Министерстве образования Республики Таджикистан. Он является начальником управления методики дошкольного и среднего образования. Он очень любит свою работу и работает с удовольствием. Чаваршо хочет отремонтировать свою квартиру. Точнее он хочет поменять окна и двери, поменять пол, а также расширить балкон. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов как древесина, краски, окна и двери. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Chavarsho is 61 years old and he is married with two children at home: one son and one daughter.  He has a higher education in linguistics and he works at the center for methodology at the Republic of Tajikistan's Ministry of Education.  He is the director of methodology for elementary and high school education.  Chavarsho loves his work very much and he does it gladly.  He wants to make repairs to his apartment, specifically he wants to put in new windows, doors and flooring, and to expand his balcony.  He is asking for a loan of $1,000 to buy the building materials like wood, paint, windows and doors.  He is awaiting your kindness and counting on your charity.

loans.use: To buy building materials like wood, paint, windows and doors to make repairs on his flat

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер энергичный человек. Ему 25 лет. Он не женат и живет с мамой. Алишер более 5 лет работает торговым представителем частной организации. Его мама Башорат работает медсестрой в детском садике и получает маленькую зарплату и поэтому Алишер является основным кормильцем семьи. Алишер полученную зарплату использует для покупки всех не обходимых средства для проживания. Он уже несколько лет хочет купить машину, но не может сделать сбережения. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 12000 сомони для покупки машины. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Alisher is an energetic young man of 25.  He is not married and he lives with his mother.  For more than five years, he has been working in sales for a private organization.  His mother, Bashorat, works as a nurse in a kindergarten and receives a small salary, which is why Alisher has become the primary breadwinner of his family.  He uses his salary to buy all their necessities.  For a few years, he has wanted to buy a car, but he can't do it with just his savings.  He is asking for a loan of 12,000 somoni to buy a car.  He is awaiting your kindness and counting on your charity.

loans.use: To buy a car

loans.name: Anselmo

texts.es:
Anselmo, vive con su familia, su esposa y sus hijos, solo él trabaja en la familia. Don Anselmo, se dedica a la agricultura, siembra de granos basicos y ganadería, oficio que lo aprendió desde muy joven, ya que sus padres se lo enseñaron, trabaja en tierra alquilada y no tiene horario establecido para desempeñarlo.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios, tales como: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, entre otros y para la preparación de la tierra; esta inversión le ayudara a tener todo lo necesario para trabajar.
Su sueño es obtener buenas cosechas  apoyar a sus hijos en su vida.
texts.en:
Anselmo lives with his family, hif wife and children. He is the only one who works in the family. Anselmo works in agriculture. He grows basic grain and keeps cattle. He learned this when he was very young because his parents taught it to him. He works rented land and has no set schedule for his work.

He needs the loan, which will allow him to buy necessary agricultural materials, such as fertilizer, pesticides, insecticides, insecticide, and more to prepare the land. This investment will help him to have everything he needs to work. 

His dream is to obtain good harvests and help his children in life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, insecticide, and more.

loans.name: Ana Miriam

texts.es:
Ana, se le presenta la necesidad de más capital de trabajo para continuar invirtiendo en su negocio de venta de pupusas, comida y bebidas; esta inversión le ayudara a comprar quesillo, chicharrón, carnes, pollo, condimentos, jugos, sodas, golosinas, entre otros.
El crédito anterior fue favorable, ya que le ayudo a aumentar sus ventas y obtener ingresos positivos; las circunstancias familiares se mantienen igual y sus condiciones económicas han mejorado.
texts.en:
Ana needs more working capital to continue investing in her business selling pupusas, food and drinks. This investment will help her buy farmer's cheese, chicharrón, meat, chicken, seasonings, juices, sodas, candies and more.

The previous loan was favorable, since it helped her increase her sales and obtain positive income. Her family circumstances are the same and her financial conditions have improved.

loans.use: to buy farmer's cheese, chicharrón, meat, chicken, seasonings, juices, sodas, candies, and more.

loans.name: Chomchaj Group

texts.es:
La señora Catalina de estado civil unida de hecho, cuenta con 39 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 7 hijos y 2 de ellos están estudiando, ella se dedica al comercio de una tienda, inició este negocio con la ayuda de su esposo y hasta el momento lleva 9 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de artículos para surtir su negocio como: productos enlatados, granos básicos, aguas gaseosas, refrescos, huevos, jabones, etc. desea en el futuro contar con una abarrotería y distribuir a las pequeñas tiendas. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio y actividades pecuarias.
texts.en:
Señora Catalina is 39, married, and the mother of seven children, two of them in school. She never had the chance to go to school, but she opened a store nine years ago with the help of her husband, who also has a business.  

Catalina has organized a group and is applying for a loan that she will use to purchase goods for her business, such as: canned goods, staple grains, sodas, snacks, eggs, soaps, etc. Catalina hopes to one day run a grocery store and distribute goods to small shops. The other members of the group work in various businesses and raising livestock.

loans.use: Compra de artículos de consumo diario.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel,  tiene 42 años de edad, está casado y su esposa tiene 40 años de edad, poseen dos hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 12 y 15 años, estudian en el colegio. El, se dedica a la venta de comida y bebidas refrescantes, oficio que lo desempeña junto a su esposa de lunes a sábado en un chalet que posee.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar materia prima para la elaboración de comida, tales como: carnes, pollos, verduras, condimentos, entre otros y bebidas; esta inversión le ayudara a obtener mayores ingresos e incrementar sus inventarios.
Su sueño es fortalecer el negocio y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Manuel is 42 years old, and is married to his wife, who is 40. They have two children, who are aged 12 and 15 and go to school. He makes a living selling food and soft drinks, which he does with his wife from Monday to Saturday in a premises he owns.
The loan that Manual is requesting will enable him to buy ingredients to make food, such as beef, chicken, vegetables, condiments, drinks and other items. This investment will help him to boost his earnings and stock. His dream is to strengthen his business and offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beef, chicken, vegetables, condiments, drinks and other items.

loans.name: Khojmahmad

texts.ru:
Хочмахмад проживает в районе Ч. Расулова города Худжанд, который расположен в Согдийской области (в севере) Таджикистана. Хочмахмад женатый мужчина. Ему 54 года. У него большая семья. Он является отцом семерых детей, у него 6 дочерей и сын. Хочмахмад имеет высшее образование. Вот уже несколько лет работает в джамоате (в правительственном учреждении района).
Джамоат (от арабского «джамаа» — общество, коллектив, община). В каждом районах сельской местности есть джамоаты (небольшие районы), в джамоатах сёла. 
Еще Хочмахмад занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. У него имеется дехканское хозяйство, где его жена помогает ему выращивать сельскохозяйственные культуры. 
Дехканское хозяйство это небольшое индивидуальное или коллективное частное хозяйство в котором работают несколько людей и где в основном выращивают хлопок, пшеницу или овощи - которые занимают 60% орошаемых земель в Таджикистане.
Хочмахмад совмещает работу в джамоате и растениеводство. Одной работой он не сможет прокормить свою семью. Растениеводством он занимается более двадцати лет. Этому виду деятельности он научился у своего покойного отца. 
Хочмахмад берет кредит для приобретения минеральных удобрений, чтобы получить богатый урожай.
texts.en:
Khojmahmad lives in the Rasulov region of Khujand, which is located in the Sogdian Oblast in the north of Tajikistan.  Khojmahmad is 54 years old and he is married with a large family.  He is the father of seven children - six daughters and one son.  He has a higher education and for a few years he has worked in a government office of his district, a "djamoat" (from the Arabic "djamaa" - society, group, community).  Every village in the region has a djamoat (smaller regions), and the djamoats are in the villages.

Khojmahmad is also involved in agricultural work.  He has a private farm, a "dekhkanskoe," where his wife helps him grow his crops.  A dekhkanskoe is a small, individual or collective private farm on which a few people work and where the main crops grown are cotton, wheat or vegetables - these occupy about 60% of the irrigated land in Tajikistan.

Khojmahmad combines his work at the djamoat with his agricultural work.  Neither one are enough to feed his whole family.  He has been involved in farming for more than 20 years.  He learned all about it from his father.  Khojmahmad is asking for a loan to buy mineral fertilizer so he can receive a rich harvest.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer to receive a rich harvest

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is a widow and has ten children. After successfully graduating middle school, Francisca is now an established businesswoman. She sells a variety of foodstuff, and also produces palm oil in Ve-Deme (near Hohoe). She has been actively involved in this business for about 15 years. 

As the sole breadwinner in the family, Francisca uses her income to provide for the entire family. Francisca will use the loan to purchase more yams, plantains, and other food stuff, plus palm fruits for the production of palm oil, thus aiding her in improving overall sales. 

With the new profits from her expanded business, Francisca plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase more yams, plantains, and other food stuff, plus palm fruits for the production of palm oil, thus helping her improve overall sales

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is a 46-year-old married woman and the mother of six. She has had a tailoring business for many years to support her husband. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet the expenses of the household with the educational needs of children. That is why she started tailoring at home to support her family well. She, together with her husband, manage their household while operating a business. 

At this time, she is working hard to provide continual income for their everyday expenses. 

Now she requested a loan of Rs. 30,000 to purchase more reels of thread, along with the packs of buttons, lace, and elastic. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Bushra hopes to grow her business, and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of thread, along with packs of buttons, lace, and elastic.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es: Avelina de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida  sus dos hijos mayores de edad y dos nietos pequeños, ella se dedica a la venta de leche, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en su vivienda y también comercia de forma ambulante, es muy conocida por las personas del lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todos saben que  lo que vende es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden y al alcance de los clientes; Avelina es una mujer comprometida, dedicada a su labor y muy luchadora día con día se esfuerza al máximo para ganarse una vida mejor y un gran éxito para el futuro. Ella desea seguir mejorando su vivienda e instalar teja de barro para tener un ambiente más fresco y comodidad en su vivienda, así que también reforzará con polínes el techo existente; pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar la teja, polin, cemento entre otros para la instalación.
